jganu.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is angular; x2 corner; (segment x3 can be defined by interval). See also {kojna}, {linji}, {konju}, {mokca}.

jgari.definition: x1 grasps/holds/clutches/seizes/grips/[hugs] x2 with x3 (part of x1) at locus x4 (part of x2).
jgari.notes: Hug (= {birjai}, {pamjai}); handshake (= {xanjaisi'u}); hold with hands (= {xanjai}); handle (= {jaitci}). See also {ralte}, {pencu}, {darxi}, {batke}, {rinju}.

jgena.definition: x1 is a knot/tangle in/between x2 (object/jo'u-objects).
jgena.notes: Knot (verb = jgegau, jgezu'e, jgeri'a, jgela'a), knot: fastening between two or more cords (= {jgeterjo'e}). See also {pluja}, {julne}, {lasna}, {skori}.

jgina.definition: x1 is a gene of creature [or locus on creature] x2 determining trait/process x3.

jgira.notes: An emotional combination of satisfaction and respect/esteem towards property(ies) or action(s) of person/entity that has a specific tie to emoter; self-pride (= {se'ijgi}, {tolcumla}); use x2 tu'a for pride in non-specific actions/properties of someone. See also {cinmo}, {cumla}, {sevzi}, {sinma}, {snada}.

jgita.definition: x1 is guitar/violin/fiddle/harp [stringed musical instrument] with actuator/plectrum/bow x2.
jgita.notes: Also lute, viola, cello. See also {zgike}.

jibni.definition: x1 is near/close to/approximates x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni).

jibri.definition: x1 is a job/occupation/employment/vocation (a type of work regularly done for pay) of person x2.
jibri.notes: Working for another (= {selplijibri}). See also {briju}, {gunka}, {te} {jerna} which is employment specifically for pay and not specifically for another, {te} {pilno} which is employment not necessarily for pay and not necessarily regular or lasting but for another, {se} {gasnu} and {se} {zukte} for incidental activities.

jicla.definition: x1 (object, or event: force) stirs/mixes/[roils/agitates] fluid (gas/liquid) x2.

jicmu.definition: x1 is a basis/foundation/underlying or fundamental principle of x2; x1 is at the bottom of x2.
jicmu.notes: x2 is founded on basis x1 (= selcmu for reordered places); (adjective:) x1 is basic/basal/fundamental); (generally events and properties will be bases for events and states, while objects may be bases/bottoms for objects). See also cmavo list {ji'u}, {jamfu}, {zbepi}, {genja}, {krasi}.

jijnu.definition: x1 (person) intuits x2 (du'u) about subject x3; [epistemology].
jijnu.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jimpe}, {jinvi}, {nabmi}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {smadi}.

jikca.definition: x1 interacts/behaves socially with x2; x1 socializes with/is sociable towards x2.

jikru.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of liquor/spirits distilled from x2.

jilka.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of alkali/base of composition including x2.

jilra.definition: x1 (person) is jealous of/envies x2 (person) about/for x3 (property - ka).

jimca.definition: x1 is a branch/bough/limb of x2; x2 forks into branches x1; [preferred over metaphorical birka].

jimpe.definition: x1 understands/comprehends fact/truth x2 (du'u) about subject x3; x1 understands (fi) x3.

jimte.definition: x1 is a limit/extreme/bound/border/[confinement] of x2 in property/domain x3.
jimte.notes: Restrain/constrain within limits (= {jitri'u}, {jitygau}, {jityzu'e}). See also cmavo list {ji'e}, {traji}, {korbi}, {kuspe}, {rinju}, {bapli}, {curmi}, {fanta}, {jbini}.

jinci.definition: x1 is a pair of shears/scissors for cutting x2.

jinga.definition: x1 (person/team) wins/gains prize x2 from/over x3 [competitors/losers] in competition x4.
jinga.notes: Also: x1 is a victor; x2 reward; x3 competitors here are opponents and in many situations, defeated/losers, vs. the set of those competing for a goal; x2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyji'a}, posyselji'a for unambiguous {semantics}).  See also {cirko}, {jivna}, {talsa}, {cnemu}, {prali}, {pleji}, {sfasa}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {bradi}, {kargu}, {kelci}.

jinku.definition: x1 is a vaccine/immune-system stimulant protecting x2 against disease x3 introduced by method x4.
jinku.notes: Also serum; inoculation (= jestu'u {veljinku}). See also {jurme}, {mikce}, {jesni}, {bilma}.

jinme.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of made of metal of composition including x2.

jinru.definition: x1 (object/person) is immersed/submerged/bathes in liquid x2.

jinsa.definition: x1 (object) is clean/pure of material/contaminant/dirt x2 by standard x3.

jinto.definition: x1 is a well/spring of fluid x2 at location x3.

jinvi.definition: x1 thinks/opines x2 [opinion] (du'u) is true about subject/issue x3 on grounds x4.
jinvi.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {nabmi}, {pensi}, {senpi}, {sidbo}, {birti}, {pinka}.

jinzi.definition: x1 (property - ka) is an innate/inherent/intrinsic/natural property/quality/aspect of x2.

jipci.definition: x1 is a chicken/[hen/cock/rooster]/small fowl [a type of bird] of species/breed x2.

jipno.definition: x1 is a tip/point/vertex/extremity/end [0-dimension shape/form] on object x2 at locus x3.

jirna.definition: x1 is a/the horn [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: pointed extremity].

jisra.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of juice/nectar from-source/of-type x2.
jisra.notes: Water-based extract from a (generally) biological source. See also {pinxe}, {djacu}, {grute}, {stagi}.

jitfa.definition: x1 (du'u) is false/is an untruth by standard/epistemology/metaphysics x2.
jitfa.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {fatci}, {stace}, {jetnu}, {cfika}.

jitro.definition: x1 has control over/harnesses/manages/directs/conducts x2 in x3 (activity/event/performance).
jitro.notes: x2 are aspects/individuals controlled within activity/event x3; manage (= {selzuktro}, {selzukfu'e}, {gu'etro}, {gunfu'e}, {xaktro}, {xakfu'e}) (as distinct from manager/boss = gunterbe'e, gunja'a, gunmi'e, gunca'i). (cf. cmavo list ji'o, bapli, te bende, gidva - which does not necessarily control or command, jatna, macnu, minde, ponse, ralju, rinka, sazri, turni, vlipa, xance, xlura)

jivbu.definition: x1 weaves x2 from material/[yarn] x3.

jivna.definition: x1 competes/vies with opponent x2 in contest/competition x3 (event) for gain x4; x1 rivals x2.
jivna.notes: Also x2 opponent(s), competitor(s), rival(s); x3 competition, race; x4 prize, reward, recognition (gain may be internal or external). See also {cnemu}, {jinga}, {talsa}, {bradi}, {fapro}, {kelci}.

jmaji.definition: x1 (mass/jo'u) gathers/collects at location x2 from locations x3 (mass/jo'u).

jmifa.definition: x1 is a shoal [shallow hazard]/reef of material x2 in body of water x3.

jmina.definition: x1 adds/combines x2 to/with x3, with result x4; x1 augments x2 by amount x3.

jmive.definition: x1 lives/is alive by standard x2; x1 is an organism/living thing.
jmive.notes: (adjective:) x1 is vital, organic. See also {lifri}, {morsi}, {stuzi}, {zvati}, {xabju}.

jordo.definition: x1 reflects Jordanian culture/nationality in aspect x2.

jorne.definition: x1 is joined to/connects to/is united with x2 at common locus x3; x1 and x2 are a union.
jorne.notes: Also joined/fastened/attached by joint x3/by means of x3/with fastener x3; fastener (= {jo'etci}, {jonvelyla'a}); train, sequence of joined objects (= jonpoi; porjo'e for a single object joined into a sequence). See also {lasna}, {fenso}, {kansa}, {pencu}, {penmi}.

jubme.definition: x1 is a table/flat solid upper surface of material x2, supported by legs/base/pedestal x3.

judri.definition: x1 is an address of/are coordinates of x2 in system x3.

jufra.definition: x1 (text) is a sentence/statement about x2 [topic/subject/predicate/focus] in language x3.

jukni.definition: x1 is a spider/arachnid/crustacean/crab/lobster/non-insect arthropod of species/breed x2.

jukpa.definition: x1 cooks/prepares food-for-eating x2 by recipe/method x3 (process).
jukpa.notes: Cook with heat (= {glajukpa}, {glaterjukpa}), bake (= {tokyjukpa}); fry (= {rasyjukpa}). See also {cupra}, {bredi}.

julne.definition: x1 is a net/filter allowing passage of x2, prohibiting passage of x3, netting properties x4.

jundi.definition: x1 is attentive towards/attends/tends/pays attention to object/affair x2.

jungo.definition: x1 reflects Chinese [Mandarin, Cantonese, Wu, etc.] culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

junla.definition: x1 is clock/watch/timer measuring time units x2 to precision x3 with timing mechanism/method x4.

junri.definition: x1 (person) is serious/earnest/has gravity about x2 (event/state/activity).

junta.definition: x1 is the weight of object x2 in [gravitational or other force] field x3.

jurme.definition: x1 is a bacterium/germ/microbe/protozoan/amoeba [1-celled life] of species/defining property x2.

jutsi.definition: x1 is a species of genus x2, family x3, etc.; [open-ended tree-structure categorization].
jutsi.notes: Also subspecies, order, phylum; (places do not correspond to specific levels in the hierarchy; rather, x1 is at a "lower" or "bushier" part of the tree than x2, x2 is "lower" than x3, etc.; skipping a place thus means that there is one or more known-and-unspecified levels of hierarchy between the two); not limited to Linnean animal/plant taxonomy. See also {klesi}, {lanzu}.

juxre.definition: x1 (action) is clumsy/awkward by standard x2.

jvinu.definition: x1 is the view/scene/panorama/sight/prospect of x2 (object/location) from point-of-view x3.
jvinu.notes: Also x1 is on display to x2/x3. See also {catlu}, {kanla}, {viska}, {canko}, {jarco}.

kabri.definition: x1 is a cup/glass/tumbler/mug/vessel/[bowl] containing contents x2, and of material x3.
kabri.notes: A kabri is normally eaten from by lifting it; a palta is not. See also {palta}, {citka}, {blaci}, {tansi}.

kacma.definition: x1 is a camera/photographic equipment recording illumination type x2 images to medium x3.

kadno.definition: x1 reflects Canadian culture/nationality in aspect x2.

kafke.definition: x1 coughs/farts/burps up/out x2 [predominantly gaseous] from orifice x3.

kagni.definition: x1 is a company/corporation/firm/partnership chartered by authority x2 for purpose x3.

kajde.definition: x1 (event/experience) warns/cautions x2 (person) of/about danger x3 (event/state/property).
kajde.notes: Agentive warning (= {jdegau}, {jdezu'e}); an attempt to warn which may not succeed (= {jdetoi}, {jdegautoi}, {jdezuktoi}). See also {ckape}, {nupre}, {snura}, {tcica}, {xlura}.

kajna.definition: x1 is a shelf/counter/bar in/on/attached to supporting object x2, for purpose x3.

kakne.definition: x1 is able to do/be/capable of doing/being x2 (event/state) under conditions x3 (event/state).
kakne.notes: Also: has talent; know how to; know how to use (= {plika'e}). (cf. stati, certu, gasnu (in the time-free potential sense), cmavo list ka'e, cmavo list nu'o, cmavo list pu'i, djuno, zifre)

kakpa.definition: x1 (agent) digs x2 [material] up/out of x3 [source/hole] with limbs/tool(s) x4.
kakpa.notes: Also x1 cuts into x3 (with material removal). See also {katna}, {plixa}, {sraku}, {canpa}, {sraku}.

kalci.definition: x1 is a/the feces/excrement/dung/shit of x2 (animal/person); (adjective:) x1 is fecal (matter).

kalri.definition: x1 (portal/passage/entrance-way) is open/ajar/not shut permitting passage/access to x2 by x3.

kalsa.definition: x1 is chaotic/disordered in property/aspect x2 (ka).

kalte.definition: x1 hunts/stalks prey/quarry/game x2 for purpose x3.
kalte.notes: Also verb: to fish (= {fipkalte}). See also {jersi}, {kavbu}, {sisku}, {rivbi}.

kamju.definition: x1 is a column/pillar of material x2.

kamni.definition: x1 (mass) is a committee with task/purpose x2 of body x3.

kampu.definition: x1 (property - ka) is common/general/universal among members of set x2 (complete set).
kampu.notes: Only fully universal sense applies; x1 must be found in all members of x2. For the non-universal sense see {fadni} and {zilfadni}. See also {cafne}, {rirci}, {fadni}, {cnano}, {tcaci}, {lakne}, {cmima}, {simxu}.

kanba.definition: x1 is a goat/angora/[billy-goat/kid] of species/breed x2.

kancu.definition: x1 (agent) counts the number in set x2 to be x3 [number/count] counting [off] by units x4.

kandi.definition: x1 is dim/dull/pale/non-intense in property x2 (ka) as received/measured by observer x3.
kandi.notes: In colors, indicates unsaturated, pastel, pale (though blabi can also indicate a kind of paleness). See also {blabi}, {carmi}, {klina}, {linto}, {manku}, {murse}, {ruble}, {skari}, {milxe}, {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xekri}, {xunre}, {zirpu}.

kanji.definition: x1 calculates/reckons/computes x2 [value (ni)/state] from data x3 by process x4.

kanla.definition: x1 is a/the eye [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: sensory apparatus]; (adjective:) x1 is ocular.

kanro.definition: x1 is healthy/fit/well/in good health by standard x2.

kansa.definition: x1 is with/accompanies/is a companion of x2, in state/condition/enterprise x3 (event/state).
kansa.notes: x1 is together with/along with x2. See also {kagni}, {jorne}, {gunma}, {girzu}, {lasna}.

kantu.definition: x1 is a quantum/ray/elementary particle/smallest measurable increment of property/activity x2.
kantu.notes: Quantum ray (= {bonka'u}). (cf. selci for masses and most objects; ratni, gradu, gusni, nejni, linji)

kanxe.definition: x1 is a conjunction, stating that x2 (du'u) and x3 (du'u) are both true.

karbi.definition: x1 [observer] compares x2 with x3 in property x4 (ka), determining comparison x5 (state).

karce.definition: x1 is a car/automobile/truck/van [a wheeled motor vehicle] for carrying x2, propelled by x3

karda.definition: x1 is a card [small nearly-2-dimensional shape/form] of material x2, shape x3.

kargu.definition: x1 (object/commodity/property/event) is costly/expensive/dear to x2 by standard x3.
kargu.notes: x1 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= poskargu for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {vamji}, {dirba}, {vajni}, {jdima}, {pleji}, {canja}, {jerna}, {jinga}, {jemna}, {sfasa}, {vecnu}.

karli.definition: x1 is a collar/ring/belt/band around/surrounding x2 made of material x3.

karni.definition: x1 is a journal/periodical/magazine/[newspaper] with content x2 published by x3 for audience x4.
karni.notes: x2 may be a subject, but not all journals have a single subject; all have some sort of principle defining what is included, so this need not be a list. See also {papri}, {pelji}, {tcidu}.

katna.definition: x1 (tool/blade/force) cuts [through]/splits/divides x2 (object) into pieces x3.
katna.notes: For x1 force, it is a force acting as a blade, not acting upon a blade; agentive cutting (= {ka'argau}, {ka'arzu'e}). (cf. kakpa, sraku for cutting into without division; plixa, dakfu, jinci, porpi, spofu, tunta, xrani, fatri, fendi, balre, dilcu)

kavbu.definition: x1 captures/catches/apprehends/seizes/nabs x2 with trap/restraint x3.
kavbu.notes: Catch something thrown (= {rerkavbu}). See also {jersi}, {kalte}, {pinfu}, {sisku}, se {rinju}.

kecti.definition: x1 (person) pities/feels sorry for x2 (person) about x3 (abstraction).

kelci.notes: Play game (= {ci'erkei}), play competitively (= {jvikei}). See also {jivna}, {jinga}, {zdile}.

kelvo.definition: x1 is x2 degree(s) Kelvin [metric unit] in temperature (default is 1) by standard x3.

kenra.definition: x1 is a cancer [malignant disease] in x2.

kensa.definition: x1 is outer space near/associated with celestial body/region x2.

kerfa.definition: x1 is a/the hair/fur [body-part] of x2 at body location x3.

kerlo.definition: x1 is a/the ear [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: sensory apparatus, information gathering].

ketco.definition: x1 reflects South American culture/nationality/geography in aspect x2.

kevna.definition: x1 is a cavity/hole/hollow/cavern in x2; x1 is concave within x2; x2 is hollow at locus x1.
kevna.notes: Also pit, depression, concavity; hollow (= {selke'a}). See also {fenra}, {kunti}, {canlu}, {canko}, {galxe}, {tubnu}.

kicne.definition: x1 cushions x2 with material x3; x1 is a cushion/pillow/pad [for x2] of padding material x3.

kijno.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of oxygen (O); [metaphor: supporting life/combustion].

kilto.definition: x1 is a thousand [1000; $10^3$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

kinli.definition: x1 is sharp/keen at locus x2.

kisto.definition: x1 reflects Pakistani/Pashto culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

klaji.definition: x1 is a street/avenue/lane/drive/cul-de-sac/way/alley/[road] at x2 accessing x3.
klaji.notes: Also corridor; not typically a route between points, but offers access to sites along it. See also {naxle}, {panka}, {pluta}, {dargu}.

klaku.definition: x1 weeps/cries tears x2 about/for reason x3 (event/state).

klama.definition: x1 comes/goes to destination x2 from origin x3 via route x4 using means/vehicle x5.
klama.notes: Also travels, journeys, moves, leaves to ... from ...; x1 is a traveller; (x4 as a set includes points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). See also {cadzu}, {bajra}, {marce}, {vofli}, {litru}, {muvdu}, {cpare}, cmavo list {ka'a}, {pluta}, {bevri}, {farlu}, {limna}, {vitke}.

klani.definition: x1 is a quantity quantified/measured/enumerated by x2 (quantifier) on scale x3 (si'o).
klani.notes: Also count. See also cmavo list {la'u}, {namcu}.

klesi.definition: x1 (mass/si'o) is a class/category/subgroup/subset within x2 with defining property x3 (ka).
klesi.notes: Also type, kind, classification, species, genus, family, order, phylum. See also cmavo list {le'a}, {cmima}, {jutsi}, {ciste}, {girzu}, {lanzu}, {vrici}.

klina.definition: x1 (object/medium) is clear/transparent/without obstacle to in-the-clear x2 [transmission].
klina.notes: Also lucid; x2 remains apparent/lucid/clear (figurative use for 'understandable' is discouraged, better expressed as = {filseljmi} or {filsmu}). (cf. {kandi}, {zunti} - {nalzu'i} is better for 'unhindered')

kliru.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of halogen of type x2 [chlorine, fluorine, iodine, etc.].
kliru.notes: Also bromine; default chlorine. See also {xukmi}.

kliti.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of clay [moist, clammy dirt] of composition including x2.

klupe.definition: x1 is a screw [fastener] for purpose x2, threads [pitch, material] x3, frame [size, material] x4.

kluza.definition: x1 (obj.) is loose/bloused/not tight on x2 (obj.) at locus x3.

kobli.definition: x1 is a quantity of cabbage/lettuce/leafy vegetable of species/strain x2.

kojna.definition: x1 is a corner/point/at-least-3-dimensional [solid] angle [shape/form] in/on x2, of material x3.
kojna.notes: Also apex; a corner exists on three dimensions but need not be limited to points; it suggests a discontinuity in slope in some direction; i.e. in some planar cross-section. See also {jipno}, {konju}, {bliku}, {fanmo}, {jganu}, {krasi}.

kolme.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of coal/peat/anthracite/bitumen from source x2.

komcu.definition: x1 is a comb [many-needled shape] of material x2 with tines/needles x3.

konju.definition: x1 is a cone [shape/form] of material x2 with vertex x3.

korbi.definition: x1 is an edge/margin/border/curb/boundary of x2 next-to/bordering-on x3.

korcu.definition: (adjective:) x1 is bent/crooked/not straight or direct/[twisted]/folded.

korka.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of cork/bark from tree/species x2; [material].

kosta.definition: x1 is a coat/jacket/sweater/cloak/[cape/shawl/pullover] [extra outer garment] of material x2.

kramu.definition: x1 is x2 local area unit(s) [non-metric] (default 1) by standard x3, x4 subunits.
kramu.notes: (additional subunit places may be added as x5, x6, ...); See also {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}.

krasi.definition: x1 (site/event) is a source/start/beginning/origin of x2 (object/event/process).
krasi.notes: Also root (figurative sense); (adjective:) x1 is initial. See also {fanmo}, cmavo list {ra'i}, {sabji}, {cfari}, {jipno}, {traji}, {kojna}, {genja}, {jicmu}, {sitna}, {jinto}.

krati.definition: x1 represents/is an agent/proxy/stands-in for [absent] x2 in matter(s)/function(s) x3.
krati.notes: Also: on behalf of. See also cmavo list {ka'i}, {jansu}, {catni}, {vipsi}, {pulji}.

krefu.definition: x1 (event) is the x3'rd recurrence/repetition of x2 (abstract); x2 happens again in [form] x1.
krefu.notes: Also case, another, instance, different, other, time, occasion. See also {fukpi}, {rapli}, {cafne}, {fasnu}, {xruti}.

krici.definition: x1 believes [regardless of evidence/proof] belief/creed x2 (du'u) is true/assumed about subject x3.
krici.notes: "without evidence" refers to objective external evidence; also gives credence, has conviction. See also {censa}, {cevni}, {lijda}, {makfa}, {malsi}, {senpi}, {birti}.

krili.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of crystal of composition x2 in form/arrangement x3.
krili.notes: x2: composition including x2, which need not be complete specification. See also {jemna}, {bisli}.

krinu.definition: x1 (event/state) is a reason/justification/explanation for/causing/permitting x2 (event/state).
krinu.notes: See also {ciksi}, {rinka}, {nibli}, {mukti}, se {jalge}, te {zukte}, cmavo list {ki'u}, {bapli}.

krixa.definition: x1 cries out/yells/howls sound x2; x1 is a crier.

kruca.definition: x1 intersects/crosses/traverses x2 at locus x3.

kruji.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of cream/emulsion/puree [consistency] of composition x2.
kruji.notes: [x2: composition including x2, which need not be complete specification]]; See also {ladru}, {matne}.

kruvi.definition: x1 is a curve/turn/bend in x2, at locus x3, and defined by set of points/properties x4.
kruvi.notes: (adjective:) x1 is curved; (x4 as a set of points is sufficiently specified to identify the relevant properties of the bend). See also {korcu}, {bargu}, {genxu}, {linji}, {sirji}.

kubli.definition: x1 is a cube/regular polyhedron/polygon of dimensions x2 (def. 3), surfaces/sides x3 (def. 6).
kubli.notes: (cf. kurfa - needed for 'cube', bliku for a physical object; tanbo, tapla, tarmi)

kucli.definition: x1 is curious/wonders about/is interested in/[inquisitive about] x2 (object/abstract).

kufra.definition: x1 feels comfort/is comfortable with conditions/environmental property(ies) x2.

kukte.definition: x1 is delicious/tasty/delightful to observer/sense x2 [person, or sensory activity].
kukte.notes: x1 is a delicacy. See also {gusta}, {ralci}, {vrusi}, {cpina}.

kulnu.definition: x1 [mass of ideas, customs, skills, arts] is culture of nation/ethos x2 (mass); x1 is ethnic.
kulnu.notes: (note that x2 is NOT individual; culture is what is shared among people and is not an individual trait). See also cmavo list {ka'u}, cmavo list {ku'u}, {natmi}, {cecmu}.

kumfa.definition: x1 is a room of/in structure x2 surrounded by partitions/walls/ceiling/floor x3 (mass/jo'u).

kumte.definition: x1 is a camel/llama/alpaca/vicuna/dromedary of species/breed x2.
kumte.notes: Llama (= {tcokumte}), Bactrian camel (= {zdokumte}); Arabian camel/dromedary (= {rabykumte}). See also {sunla}, {kanla}, {xirma}, {xasli}.

kunra.definition: x1 is/contains/is made from a mineral/ore of type/metal x2 mined from location/lode/mine x3.

kunti.definition: x1 [container] is empty/vacant of x2 [material]; x1 is hollow.
kunti.notes: Also vacuum (= kunti be roda/so'ada). See also {culno}, {tisna}, {claxu}, {canlu}, {kevna}, {setca}.

kurfa.definition: x1 is a right-angled shape/form defined by set of vertices x2, dimensions x3 (default 2).
kurfa.notes: Also rectangle, square, rectilinear; square (= {kubykurfa}, {pitkubykurfa}), cube (= {kurkubli}), rectangle (= {clakurfa}), rhombus/diamond (= {sa'orkurfa}, {sa'orpitkubli}). See also {bliku}, {kubli}, {tapla}, {salpo}, {tarmi}.

kurji.definition: x1 takes-care-of/looks after/attends to/provides for/is caretaker for x2 (object/event/person).
kurji.notes: Also tends, cares for, keeps; x1 is a keeper/custodian of x2. See also {jundi}, {cinri}, {prami}, {raktu}, {zgana}.

kurki.definition: x1 is bitter/acrid/sharply disagreeable to observer/sense x2.

kusru.definition: x1 (person) is cruel/mean/unkind to victim x2.

labno.definition: x1 is a wolf/lupine of species/breed x2.

lacpu.definition: x1 pulls/tugs/draws/drags x2 by handle/at locus x3.

lacri.definition: x1 relies/depends/counts on/trusts x2 to bring about/ensure/maintain x3 (event/state).

ladru.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of milk from source x2; (adjective:) x1 is lactic/dairy.

lafti.definition: x1 (force) lifts/applies raising/supporting force to x2 at locus x3 in gravity well x4.
lafti.notes: (x1 may be an abstract); verb lift/raise/elevate (= {lafmuvgau}). See also {farlu}, {plipe}.

lakne.definition: x1 (event/state/property) is probable/likely under conditions x2.

lakse.definition: x1 is quantity of wax [substance especially soft/moldable when warm] from source x2.

lalxu.definition: x1 is a lake/lagoon/pool at site/within land mass x2.

lamji.definition: x1 is adjacent/beside/next to/in contact with x2 in property/sequence x3 in direction x4.
lamji.notes: Also touching, contiguous, against. See also {zvati}, {cpana}, {jibni}, {diklo}, {stuzi}, {bartu}, {jbini}.

lanbi.definition: x1 is a quantity of protein/albumin of type x2 composed of amino acids (sequence/jo'u) x3 .

lanci.definition: x1 is a flag/banner/standard of/symbolizing x2 with pattern(s) x3 on material x4.

lanka.definition: x1 is a basket with contents x2, woven from material x3.

lanli.definition: x1 analyzes/examines-in-detail x2 by method/technique/system x3 [process/activity].

lanme.definition: x1 is a sheep/[lamb/ewe/ram] of species/breed x2 of flock x3.

lante.definition: x1 is a can/tightly sealed/pre-sealed container for perishable contents x2, made of x3.

lanxe.definition: x1 is in balance/equilibrium under forces x2 (mass).
lanxe.notes: (cf. midju, nutli; fapro for balancing/opposing forces, nutli)

lanzu.definition: x1 (mass) is a family with members including x2 bonded/tied/joined according to standard x3.
lanzu.notes: Also clan, tribe; x2 is in x1, a member of x1 (selylanzu for reordered places); relative (= lazmi'u - xy mintu y'y leka cmima da poi lanzu). See also {natmi}, {cmima}, {girzu}, {jutsi}, {klesi}.

larcu.definition: x1 (process) is an art [creative application] of craft/skill x2 (idea/activity).

lasna.definition: x1 (agent) fastens/connects/attaches/binds/lashes x2 to x3 with fastener x4.
lasna.notes: No implication that result is considered a single object; although x2 and x3 may be reversible, x3 may be used for the substrate, the fixed/larger object to which x2 becomes attached. See also {jorne}, {fenso}, {jgena}, {batke}, {dinko}, {kansa}.

lastu.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of brass [copper/zinc alloy] of composition including x2.

latmo.definition: x1 reflects Latin/Roman/Romance culture/empire/language in aspect x2.

latna.definition: x1 is a lotus, plant/flower/herb of species/strain x2 symbolizing x3 to culture/religion x4.

lazni.definition: x1 (person) is lazy/avoiding work/effort concerning action x2.

lebna.notes: Also confiscate, appropriate. Acquire with volition such that x1 gains possession; x3 is possessor and not merely source, alienation is implied. (cf. punji, cpacu where volition or previous possession is not necessarily implied, vimcu for alienation where x1 need not gain possession, canci, cliva)

lenjo.definition: x1 is a lens/glass [focussing shape/form] focussing x2 to focus/foci x3 by means/material x4.
lenjo.notes: (adjective:) x1 is optical; focussing may be optical or otherwise, hence x2 which may be light, sound, X-ray, etc., default is light/optical lens; ka is refraction. See also {kacma}, {minra}.

lenku.definition: x1 is cold/cool by standard x2.

lerci.definition: x1 (event) is late by standard x2.

lerfu.definition: x1 (la'e zo BY/word-bu) is a letter/digit/symbol in alphabet/character-set x2 representing x3.
lerfu.notes: Also x1 glyph, rune, character (also me'o BY/word-bu), x2 symbol set; (adjective:) x1 is alphabetic/symbolic; "letteral" used by analogy with "numeral"; sinxa is the more generic symbol. See also {mifra}, {namcu}, {sinxa}, {pandi}.

libjo.definition: x1 reflects Libyan culture/nationality in aspect x2.

lidne.definition: x1 precedes/leads x2 in sequence x3; x1 is former/preceding/previous; x2 is latter/following.
lidne.notes: Also x1 before, forerunner; leading, as in 'leading indicators'; x2 after, trailing (= selyli'e for reordered places). See also cmavo list {li'e}, {balvi}, {ralju}, {rebla}, {purci} for time sequence, {jersi}, {porsi}, {jatna}, {farna}.

lifri.definition: x1 [person/passive/state] undergoes/experiences x2 (event/experience); x2 happens to x1.
lifri.notes: Also has/have (of events/experiences); (adjective:) x1 is empirical; suggests passive undergoing but does not exclude active (per zukte) intent; a deserved experience: reward or punishment (= {jernyfri}, {zanjernyfri}, {maljernyfri}). See also cmavo list {ri'i}, {jmive}, {fasnu}, {renvi}.

lijda.definition: x1 is a religion of believers including x2 sharing common beliefs/practices/tenets including x3.
lijda.notes: Also mythos, creed, traditional beliefs, x2 people(s), adherents; (adjective:) x1, x2, x3 are religious/ecclesiastic in nature; x2 is a believer in/of x1, an adherent/follower of x1 (= seljda for reordered places); x2 is a practitioner of x3 (= selterjda for reordered places); x3 is a tenet/belief/ritual/creed of x1/x2 (= terjda for reordered places); priest/clerical (= {jdaca'i}, {jdaka'i}, {jdaja'a}); organized church/religion (= {be'ejda}); congregation (= {jdabe'e}, {jdagri}). See also {budjo}, {censa}, {cevni}, {crida}, {dadjo}, {jegvo}, {krici}, {latna}, {malsi}, {marde}, {muslo}, {pruxi}, {ranmi}, {ritli}, {xriso}, {zekri}.

lindi.definition: x1 is lightning/electrical arc/thunderbolt striking at/extending to x2 from x3.

linji.definition: x1 is a line/among lines [1-dimensional shape/form] defined by set of points x2.

linsi.definition: x1 is a length of chain/links of material x2 with link properties x3.

linto.definition: x1 is light in mass/weight by standard x2.
linto.notes: (cf. junta, tilju; se xalbo, kandi for metaphor)

lisri.definition: x1 is a story/tale/yarn/narrative about plot/subject/moral x2 by storyteller x3 to audience x4.
lisri.notes: Also legend; a narrative need not be fictional; x2 may be merely a convention rather than a subject; also x3 tells/recounts story/tale x1 about x2 to x4 (= {selterlisri} for place reordering); note that the storyteller need not be the author. See also {ranmi}, {cfika}, {skicu}, {prosa}, {pemci}.

liste.definition: x1 (physical object) is a list/catalog/register of sequence/set x2 in order x3 in medium x4.
liste.notes: Also roll, log. (x2 is completely specified); (cf. {porsi}, {girzu}, {cmima} for mental objects wherein order is of varying importance; some manifested order is intrinsic to a physical list, but the specific order may be incidental and not intentional/purposeful)

litce.definition: x1 is x2 liter(s) [metric unit] in volume (default is 1) by standard x3.

litki.definition: x1 is liquid/fluid, of composition/material including x2, under conditions x3.
litki.notes: Conditions include temperature and pressure. See also {cilmo}, {djacu}, {lumci}, {runta}, {pambe}, {sudga}, {gapci}, {sligu}, {flecu}, {jduli}.

litru.definition: x1 travels/journeys/goes/moves via route x2 using means/vehicle x3; x1 is a traveller.
litru.notes: (x2 as a set includes points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly); See also {bajra}, {cadzu}, {cpare}, {tcana}, {klama}, {cliva}, {pluta}, {limna}, {muvdu}.

livga.definition: x1 is a/the liver [body-part] of x2.

livla.definition: x1 is a fuel/energy-source for powering x2.

logji.definition: x1 [rules/methods] is a logic for deducing/concluding/inferring/reasoning to/about x2 (du'u).
logji.notes: Also (adjective:) x1, x2 are logical. See also {nibli}.

lojbo.definition: x1 reflects [Loglandic]/Lojbanic language/culture/nationality/community in aspect x2.
lojbo.notes: Pre-Lojban forms of Loglan (= {dzejbo}). See also {bangu}, {logji}.

loldi.definition: x1 is a floor/bottom/ground of x2.
loldi.notes: Floor/level/story of a building/edifice (= {setloi}, {dijysenta}). See also {bitmu}, {drudi}, {dertu}, {dizlo}, {cnita}, {zbepi}, {sarji}, {serti}.

lorxu.definition: x1 is a fox [bushy-tailed wild dog/canine] of species/breed x2.

lubno.definition: x1 reflects Lebanese culture/nationality in aspect x2.

lujvo.definition: x1 (text) is a compound predicate word with meaning x2 and arguments x3 built from metaphor x4.

lumci.definition: x1 (agent) washes/cleanses x2 of soil/contaminant x3 in/with cleaning material(s) x4.

lunbe.definition: x1 is bare/naked/nude; x1 is without cover/clothes/[protection].

lunra.definition: x1 is Earth's moon (default); x1 is a major natural satellite/moon of planet x2.

lunsa.definition: x1 condenses/liquefies on/into x2 at temperature x3, pressure x4; x1 is dew/condensate on x2.

mabla.definition: x1 is a derogative connotation/sense of x2 used by x3; x3 derogates/'curses at' x2 in form x1.
mabla.notes: Bloody (British sense), fucking, shit, goddamn. See also {palci}, {dapma}, {xlali}, {zabna}, {funca}, {ganti}, {ganxo}, {gletu}, {gutra}, {kalci}, {pinca}, {pinji}, {plibu}, {vibna}, {vlagi}, {zargu}.

mabru.definition: x1 is a mammal/'animal'/beast of species x2.

macnu.definition: x1 (event/action/process) is manual [not automatic] in function x2 under conditions x3.

makcu.definition: x1 is mature/ripe/fully-grown/adult in development-quality x2 (ka).

makfa.definition: x1 is magic/supernatural/sorcery/witchcraft/wizardry to x2, performed by person/force/deity x3.

maksi.definition: x1 is magnetic [adjective] producing magnetic field x2.

malsi.definition: x1 is a temple/church/sanctuary/synagogue/shrine of religion x2 at location/serving area x3.
malsi.notes: x2 may be event of form (... worships/pays/respect to ...), hence (metaphorically extending to) monument (= {mojmalsi}, {si'armalsi}). See also {cevni}, {krici}, {lijda}, {ritli}.

mamta.definition: x1 is a mother of x2; x1 bears/mothers/acts maternally toward x2; [not necessarily biological].

manfo.definition: x1 (object/event) is uniform/homogeneous in property x2 (ka).

manri.definition: x1 is a frame of reference/standard for observing/measuring/determining x2, with/by rules x3.
manri.notes: (x1 may be object or si'o idea); See also cmavo list {ma'i}, {ckilu}, {merli}, {pajni}, {cimde}, {jdice}, {marde}.

mansa.definition: x1 satisfies evaluator x2 in property (ka)/state x3.

manti.definition: x1 is an ant of species/breed x2.

mapku.definition: x1 is a cap/hat/crown/helmet/piece of headgear [head-top garment] of material x2.

mapni.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of cotton [type of fabric/material].

mapti.definition: x1 fits/matches/suits/is compatible/appropriate/corresponds to/with x2 in property/aspect x3.

marbi.definition: x1 is a shelter/haven/refuge/retreat/harbor for/protecting x2 from danger/threat x3.

marce.definition: x1 is a vehicle/mode of transport carrying x2 in/on surface/medium x3, propelled by x4.

marde.definition: x1 are the ethics/morals/moral standards/ethical standards of x2 (ind./mass) about situation x3.
marde.notes: x1 will (typically) be an abstract, a rule or rules of behavior; also principles; also conscience (= {sezmarde}). See also {palci}, {vrude}, {lijda}, {manri}, {javni}, {tarti}, {zekri}.

margu.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/made of mercury/quicksilver; [metaphor: fluid metal; temperature].

marji.definition: x1 is material/stuff/matter of type/composition including x2 in shape/form x3.
marji.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is physical (one sense)/material. See also {morna}, {mucti}, {nejni}, {tarmi}, {dacti}.

marna.definition: x1 is a quantity of hemp/marijuana/jute of species/strain x2.

marxa.definition: x1 [force] mashes/crushes/squashes/smashes x2 into pulp/mash/crumbs/deformed mass x3.

masno.definition: x1 is slow/sluggish at doing/being/bringing about x2 (event/state).

masti.definition: x1 is x2 months in duration (default is 1 month) by month standard x3.
masti.notes: This month (= {cabma'i}); next month (= {bavla'ima'i}); last month (= {prula'ima'i}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {nanca}.

matci.definition: x1 is a mat/pad/mattress/pallet [flat, soft, dense form] of material x2.

matli.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of linen/flax [type of fabric/material].

matne.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains butter/oleo/margarine/shortening from source x2.
matne.notes: (adjective:) x1 is buttery; an edible fat, solid but spreadable at normal temperatures; dairy butter (= {ladmatne}). See also {grasu}, {kruji}.

matra.definition: x1 is a motor/engine, driving/propelling/providing power to x2.

mavji.definition: x1 is a quantity of oats [grain] of species/strain x2.

maxri.definition: x1 is a quantity of wheat [grain] of species/strain x2.

mebri.definition: x1 is a/the brow/forehead [projecting flat/smooth head/body-part] of x2.

megdo.definition: x1 is a million [$10^6$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

mekso.definition: x1 [quantifier/expression] is a mathematical expression interpreted under rules/convention x2.

melbi.definition: x1 is beautiful/pleasant to x2 in aspect x3 (ka) by aesthetic standard x4.
melbi.notes: Also handsome, pretty, gorgeous, cute, comely, graceful. See also {pluka}, {xamgu}.

meljo.definition: x1 reflects Malaysian/Malay culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

menli.definition: x1 is a mind/intellect/psyche/mentality/[consciousness] of body x2.
menli.notes: (adjective:) x1 is mental/psychological/a mental phenomenon; multiple personalities (= so'i {menli}). See also {besna}, {morji}, {mucti}, {pensi}, {sanji}, {xanri}, {sevzi}, {xadni}.

mensi.definition: x1 is a sister of/sororal to x2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x3; [not necessarily biological].

mentu.definition: x1 is x2 minutes in duration (default is 1 minute) by standard x3.

merko.definition: x1 pertains to USA/American culture/nationality/dialect in aspect x2.

merli.definition: x1 (agent) measures/evaluates x2 [quantity] as x3 units on scale x4 (si'o), with accuracy x5.

mexno.definition: x1 reflects Mexican culture/nationality in aspect x2.

midju.definition: x1 is in/at the middle/center/midpoint/[is a focus] of x2; (adjective:) x1 is central.

mifra.definition: x1 is encoded/cipher text of plain-text x2 by code/coding system x3; x1 is in code; x3 is a code.

mikce.definition: x1 doctors/treats/nurses/[cures]/is physician/midwife to x2 for ailment x3 by treatment/cure x4.
mikce.notes: Also medic; (adjective:) x1, x4 is medical; x2 is a patient of x1 (= selmikce for reordered places) ; x2 is treated by x1 person/x4 treatment/method; successfully cure transitive (= {sadmikce}, {sadvelmikce}), intransitive (= sadyselmikce, ka'orbi'o to not imply an external agent/process, though the x1 and x4 of mikce may be self/internal); treatment (= {velmikce}). See also {bilma}, {kanro}, {spita}.

mikri.definition: x1 is a millionth [$10^{-6}$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

milti.definition: x1 is a thousandth [1/1000; $10^{-3}$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

milxe.definition: x1 is mild/non-extreme/gentle/middling/somewhat in property x2 (ka); x1 is not very x2.

minde.definition: x1 issues commands/orders to x2 for result x3 (event/state) to happen; x3 is commanded to occur.
minde.notes: [also: x1 orders/sets/Triggers. x2 to do/bring about x3; x1 is a commander; commanded (= {termi'e})]; See also {lacri}, te {bende}, {jatna}, {ralju}, {jitro}, {turni}, {tinbe}.

minji.definition: x1 is a machine for use/function x2; [automated apparatus, without direct function control].
minji.notes: Also machinery/mechanism; a machine is initiated/triggered by an agent/force, but thereafter performs its function automatically; if self-directed, (a minji is an) entity (= {zukte}). See also {cabra}, {matra}, {tutci}, {zukte}, {pilno}, {skami}.

minli.definition: x1 is x2 (default 1) long local distance unit(s) [non-metric], x3 subunits, standard x4.
minli.notes: (additional subunit places may be added as x5, x6, ...); See also {mitre}, {kilto}, {clani}, {ganra}, {condi}, {rotsu}, {rupnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

minra.definition: x1 reflects/mirrors/echoes x2 [object/radiation] to observer/point x3 as x4; x2 bounces on x1.
minra.notes: Also: x1 is a mirror/reflector. x2 may be light, lu'e of an imaged object; x4 may be image or echo or the same as x2 if physical object; x3 may be a path for a bounced object; ka is reflection. See also {catlu}, {viska}, {lenjo}, {pensi}.

mintu.definition: x1 is the same/identical thing as x2 by standard x3; (x1 and x2 interchangeable).
mintu.notes: (cf. panra, satci, mapti, simsa, drata, dunli, cmavo list du - which has no standard place, simxu)

mipri.definition: x1 keeps x2 secret/hidden from x3 by method x4; x2 is a secret; x1 hides/conceals x2.
mipri.notes: Intransitive hidden/secret, without an agent (= {selcri} or {nalterju'o}); secret (= {selmipri}). See also {stace}, {mifra}, {sivni}, {djuno}, {cirko}, {jarco}.

mirli.definition: x1 is a deer/elk/moose/[hart/stag/doe] of species/breed x2.

misno.definition: x1 (person/object/event) is famous/renowned/is a celebrity among community of persons x2 (mass).
misno.notes: Also celebrated/well-known; (derogative meanings:) notorious/infamous (= malmi'o; these could also be expressed using the referenced words). See also se {sinma}, {banli}.

misro.definition: x1 reflects Egyptian culture/nationality in aspect x2.

mitre.definition: x1 is x2 meter(s) [metric unit] in length (default 1) measured in direction x3 by standard x4.

mixre.definition: x1 (mass) is a mixture/blend/colloid/commingling with ingredients including x2.
mixre.notes: x2 mingles/mixes/blends into x1; x2 is in x1, an ingredient/part/component/element of x1 (= selxre for reordered places). See also {salta}, te {runta}, {stasu}, {jicla}, {sanso}.

mlana.definition: x1 is to the side of/lateral to x2 and facing x3 from point of view/in-frame-of-reference x4.
mlana.notes: (cf. crane, trixe, pritu, zunle which differ in that the direction of facing is the front and not the lateral side. The x4 of mlana may be either the front, or back side of x2, korbi)

mlatu.definition: x1 is a cat/[puss/pussy/kitten] [feline animal] of species/breed x2; (adjective:) x1 is feline.

mleca.definition: x1 is less than x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni) by amount x4.
mleca.notes: Also negative (= {nonme'a}). See also cmavo list {me'a}, cmavo list {su'o}, {jdika}, {zmadu}, {traji}.

mledi.definition: x1 is a mold/fungus/mushrooms/truffles of species/strain x2 parasitic/growing on x3.

mluni.definition: x1 is a satellite/moon orbiting x2 with characteristics x3, orbital parameters x4.

mokca.definition: x1 is a point/instant/moment [0-dimensional shape/form] in/on/at time/place x2.

moklu.definition: x1 is a/the mouth/oral cavity [body-part] of x2; (metaphor: entrance/intake for consumption).

molki.definition: x1 is a mill/foundry/industrial plant/[assembly line] performing process x2.
molki.notes: (unlike fanri,) need not produce a product; grain mill (= {grumlo}), grinding mill (= {zalmlo}, {zalmlotci}, {zalmloca'a}). See also {gasta}, {gurni}, {tirse}, {fanri}, {zalvi}.

molro.definition: x1 is x2 mole(s) [metric unit] in substance (default is 1) by standard x3.

morji.definition: x1 remembers/recalls/recollects fact(s)/memory x2 (du'u) about subject x3.

morko.definition: x1 reflects Moroccan culture/nationality in aspect x2.

morna.definition: x1 is/reflects/represents a pattern of forms/events x2 arranged according to structure x3.
morna.notes: [x3 is a model for x1 (= {termontai}, or the more abstract = {termonsi'o}); image (= {gusmo'a}, {nenmo'a}, {dairmo'a}, {selylenmo'a}, {selmirmo'a}, {velmirmo'a}, but also all of these -tai instead of -mo'a for the ideal)]; See also {ciste}, {ganzu}, {marji}, {slilu}, {stura}, {tarmi}, {boxna}, {cimde}, {gidva}, {jimpe}, {rilti}.

morsi.definition: x1 is dead/has ceased to be alive.

mosra.definition: x1 is friction [force opposing motion] due to contact/rubbing between x2 and x3; (fe) x2 rubs x3.
mosra.notes: Also x2 scrubs/wipes/brushes (against) x3 (= {seltermosra}); non-agentive rub (= {termosra}). See also {sakli}, {sraku}, {jabre}, {satre}, {guska}, {pencu}, {spali}.

mraji.definition: x1 is a quantity of rye [grain] of species/strain x2.

mrilu.definition: x1 mails/posts [transfer via intermediary service] x2 to recipient address x3 from mailbox/post office/sender address x4 by carrier/network/system x5.
mrilu.notes: Also x4 post office, mailbox. (cf. benji In which the medium need not be a 3rd party service/system, and x2 need not consist of discrete units. notci, xatra, tcana)

mruli.definition: x1 [tool] is a hammer for/hammers x2 [target] consisting of weight/head x3 propelled by x4.

mucti.definition: x1 is immaterial/not physical/without material form.

mudri.definition: x1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains wood/lumber from tree(s) of type/species x2.

mukti.definition: x1 (action/event/state) motivates/is a motive/incentive for action/event x2, per volition of x3.
mukti.notes: Also; x3 is motivated to bring about result/goal/objective x2 by x1 (= termu'i for reordered places); (note that 'under conditions' BAI may apply and be appropriately added to the main predicate level or within the x2 action level). (cf. cmavo list {mu'i}, {nibli}, te {zukte} - generally better for 'goal', se {jalge}, {krinu}, {rinka}, {ciksi}, {djica}, {xlura})

mulno.definition: x1 (event) is complete/done/finished; x1 (object) has become whole in property x2 by standard x3.
mulno.notes: Also perfected, entirety; (adverb/adjective:) entire, total, integral, fully, totally, wholly, completely, entirely. See also {fanmo}, {culno}, {pagbu}, {xadba}, {prane}, {jalge}, {sumji}, {munje}, {sisti}, {xadni}.

munje.definition: x1 is a universe/cosmos [complete and ordered entirety] of domain/sphere x2 defined by rules x3.
munje.notes: Also world; a universe is a kind of system, one which comprehensively encompasses its domain; e.g. 'universe of discourse', or 'world of birds'; x3 are the rules/defining principles which distinguish the universe from other universes, or from non-universe. See also {ciste}, {plini}, {kensa}, {mulno}.

mupli.definition: x1 is an example/sample/specimen/instance/case/illustration of common property(s) x2 of set x3.

murse.definition: x1 is the [astronomical] twilight/dawn/dusk/half-light/glimmering of day x2 at location x3.
murse.notes: Morning twilight, dawn (= {cermurse}); evening twilight, dusk (= {vacmurse}). See also {cerni}, {kandi}, {vanci}.

murta.definition: x1 is a curtain/blinds/drapes for covering/obscuring aperture x2, and made of material x3.

muslo.definition: x1 pertains to the Islamic/Moslem/Koranic [Quranic] culture/religion/nation in aspect x2.

mutce.definition: x1 is much/extreme in property x2 (ka), towards x3 extreme/direction; x1 is, in x2, very x3.
mutce.notes: Also very, pretty, a lot, immoderate/immoderately, intense, quite, extremely. See also {milxe}, {traji}, {banli}, {carmi}, {nutli}.

muvdu.definition: x1 (object) moves to destination/receiver x2 [away] from origin x3 over path/route x4.
muvdu.notes: Also mobile (= comymu'u, for the non-specific opposite of immobile); after a muvdu, object is alienated from/no longer at origin (unless physically returned there, per litru or slilu); agentive move (= {muvgau}, {muvzu'e}), non-agentive transitive move (= {muvri'a}), self-propelled (= {sezmuvgau}), motion of a part of the object (= {pagmu'u}), having a moving part (= {muvypau}, {muvyselpau}); apparent motion (= {mlumu'u}). (cf. rinci, klama (which differs in that the means of motion is explicit), litru, cliva, fatri; dunda, benji for agentive movement that does not necessarily imply alienation from origin, preja for similar movement with no agent implied, bevri, vimcu)

muzga.definition: x1 is a museum for preserving [and possibly exhibiting] x2 at location x3.

nabmi.definition: x1 (event/state) is a problem to/encountered by x2 in situation/task/inquiry x3.
nabmi.notes: Also: x1 requires consideration by x2. See also {preti}, {danfu}, {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {jinvi}, {nandu}, {pensi}, {sidbo}, {spuda}.

nakni.definition: x1 is a male/buck of species x2 evidencing masculine trait(s) x3 (ka); x1 is masculine.

nalci.definition: x1 is a/the wing [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: lateral supporting surface].

namcu.definition: x1 (li) is a number/quantifier/digit/value/figure (noun); refers to the value and not the symbol.

nanba.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains bread [leavened or unleavened] made from grains x2.

nanca.definition: x1 is x2 years in duration (default is 1 year) by standard x3; (adjective:) x1 is annual.
nanca.notes: This year (= {cabna'a}); next year (= {bavlamna'a}); last year (= {prulamna'a}). See also {detri}, {djedi}, {jeftu}, {masti}.

nandu.definition: x1 is difficult/hard/challenging for x2 under conditions x3; x1 challenges (non-agentive) x2.

nanla.definition: x1 is a boy/lad [young male person] of age x2 immature by standard x3.
nanla.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nixli}, {verba}, {nanmu}, {bersa}.

nanmu.definition: x1 is a man/men; x1 is a male humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
nanmu.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {ninmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nanla}, {bersa}.

nanvi.definition: x1 is a billionth/thousand-millionth [$10^{-9}$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

narge.definition: x1 is a nut [body-part: hard-shelled fruit] from plant/species x2 with shell x3 and kernel x4.
narge.notes: Also x4 nucleus, center (= {velnarge} for place reordering). See also {grute}, {stagi}, {jbari}, {midju}.

natfe.definition: x1 (du'u) contradicts/denies/refutes/negates x2 (du'u) under rules/logic x3.
natfe.notes: Also exception (= {nafmupli}); agentive contradict/deny (= nafxu'a or {tolxu'a}). See also {nibli}, {tugni}, {zanru}, {xusra}.

natmi.definition: x1 is a nation/ethnic group of peoples x2; [people sharing a history/culture].

navni.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of inert gas of type x2 [neon/argon/radon/xenon/krypton].

naxle.definition: x1 is a canal/channel to x2 from x3 with route x4.
naxle.notes: x2/x3 may be unordered. See also {pluta}, {rirxe}, {klaji}, {dargu}.

nazbi.definition: x1 is the nose [body-part] of x2 with nostril(s)/nasal passage(s) x3; [metaphor: protrusion].

nejni.definition: x1 is energy of type x2 in form x3.

nelci.definition: x1 is fond of/likes/has a taste for x2 (object/state).

nenri.definition: x1 is in/inside/within x2; x1 is on the inside/interior of x2 [totally within the bounds of x2].
nenri.notes: Indicates total containment. (cf. se vasru (for containment that need not be total), jbini, zvati, cpana, sruri, senta, snuji, bartu, diklo, jibni, jinru, setca)

nibli.definition: x1 logically necessitates/entails/implies action/event/state x2 under rules/logic system x3.

nicte.definition: x1 is a nighttime of day x2 at location x3; (adjective:) x1 is at night/nocturnal.
nicte.notes: Tonight (= {cabycte}); tomorrow night (= {bavlamcte}, even when tonight is still in the future); last night (= {prulamcte}). See also {donri}, {djedi}, {tcika}.

nikle.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of nickel/other metal resistant to oxidation.

nilce.definition: x1 [furniture items] furnishes x2 [location] serving purpose/function x3.

nimre.definition: x1 is a quantity of citrus [fruit/tree, etc.] of species/strain x2.

ninmu.definition: x1 is a woman/women; x1 is a female humanoid person [not necessarily adult].
ninmu.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use remna or prenu). See also {nanmu}, {remna}, {prenu}, {makcu}, {nixli}.

nirna.definition: x1 is a nerve/neuron [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: information/control network connection].
nirna.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is neural. See also ve {benji}.

nitcu.definition: x1 needs/requires/is dependent on/[wants] necessity x2 for purpose/action/stage of process x3.
nitcu.notes: No implication of lack. See also {banzu}, {cidja}, {claxu}, {pindi}, {xebni}, {sarcu}, {lacri}, {djica}, {taske}, {xagji}.

nivji.definition: x1 (agent) knits x2 [cloth/object] from yarn/thread x3.

nixli.definition: x1 is a girl [young female person] of age x2 immature by standard x3.
nixli.notes: Word dispreferred in metaphor/example as sexist; (use verba). See also {nanla}, {verba}, {ninmu}.

nobli.definition: x1 is noble/aristocratic/elite/high-born/titled in/under culture/society/standard x2.
nobli.notes: Also upper-class; high/low, upper/lower are poor Lojban metaphors; note x2 standard applies when the title/nobility is not recognized culture/society wide; this would include self-assumed titles. See also {banli}.

notci.definition: x1 is a message/notice/memorandum about subject x2 from author x3 to intended audience x4.
notci.notes: Emphasis on brevity, single or identifiable subject (contrast with xatra: the emphasis in notci is on the single or cohesively focused subject, while the audience is less defined - indeed only an 'intended' audience. xatra need not have a single or focussed subject - its corresponding place is for 'content'); reminder/memo/note (= {mojnoi}). See also {xatra}, {nuzba}, {mrilu}, {morji}.

nurma.definition: x1 is a rural/rustic/pastoral area of x2; x1 is in the country.

nutli.definition: x1 is neutral/not taking sides/medial/not towards any extreme on scale/in dissension x2.
nutli.notes: Also x2 dispute/struggle (though x2 is not limited to disagreements, which is merely one manifestation of scalar or distributed values in which there is a medial position). See also {midju}, {lanxe}, {milxe}, {mutce}, cmavo list {no'e}.

nuzba.definition: x1 (du'u) is news/tidings/new information about subject x2 from source x3, to observer x4.

pacna.definition: x1 hopes/wishes for/desires x2 (event), expected likelihood x3 (0-1); x1 hopes that x2 happens.
pacna.notes: Also: x1 is hopeful of x2; x2 will hopefully occur, as hoped for by x1; the value of x3 is a subjective estimate of likeliness according to x1, and is the basic determinant of whether pacna means 'hope' or 'wish' or 'expect': hoping for objects/states with negligible expectation is "wishing"; if the state is plausibly likely, it is "hoping"; when the probability is subjectively near 1, the attitude is described as "expecting"; the value will usually be expressed using inexact numbers ("{li} {piso'u}" to "{li} {piro}"); wish (= {sotpa'a}), hope (= {sorpa'a}), expect (= {sojypa'a}). See also {djica}.

pagbu.definition: x1 is a part/component/piece/portion/segment of x2 [where x2 is a whole/mass]; x2 is partly x1.

pagre.definition: x1 passes through/penetrates barrier/medium/portal x2 to destination side x3 from origin side x4.
pagre.notes: Passing through in both directions (= rolfargre, pagre ... .i so'ivo'ivo'u (and vice versa)). See also {bitmu}, {denci}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {vorme}, {pluta}, {canko}, {ragve}.

pajni.definition: x1 judges/referees/arbitrates/is a judge determining/deciding matter x2 (abstract).
pajni.notes: x2 includes jei = rule (jetpai), ni = estimate (lairpai), ka = evaluate (kairpai or vampai), or nu = referee/arbitrate (faurpai); single events of judging including specific decisions/judgements (= {paijdi}, {jetpaijdi}, {lairpaijdi}, {kairpaijdi}, {vampaijdi}, {faurpaijdi}); jury (= {pairkamni}), serve on a jury (= kamnypai, as part of mass x1). See also {cuxna}, {jdice}, {vajni}, {cipra}, {zekri}, {manri}, {mansa}.

palci.definition: x1 is evil/depraved/wicked [morally bad] by standard x2.

palku.definition: x1 are pants/trousers/slacks/leggings [legged garment] of material x2.

palne.definition: x1 is a tray/platter/flat container [pan/sheet/griddle] of contents x2, and made of material x3.
palne.notes: Also pallet, when used for carrying rather than support on the ground; a tray is flat-bottomed and shallow or without a rim, and is generally portable. See also {tansi}, {patxu}, {palta}, {ckana}.

palta.definition: x1 is a plate/dish/platter/saucer [flat/mildly concave food service bed] made of material x2.

pambe.definition: x1 is a pump/injector [tool/apparatus] pumping/inserting fluid x2 to x3 from x4 by means x5.
pambe.notes: x2 fluid may be liquid or gas; x5 may be a force; a pump generally causes a pressure gradient, such that x3 is a place of lower pressure, x4 a place of higher pressure. (cf. {gapci}, {litki}, {rinci}; metaphorical use of {fepri} for gas, {risna} for liquid, {rinci}, {tutci})

panci.definition: x1 is an odor/fragrance/scent/smell emitted by x2 and detected by observer/sensor x3.
panci.notes: An undetected emitter is odorless to the observer. See also {nazbi}, {sumne}, {cpina}.

pandi.definition: x1 (agent) punctuates x2 (expression) with symbol/word x3 with syntactic/semantic effect x4.

panje.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sponge/porous material.
panje.notes: Also metaphorically used for coral, Swiss cheese. See also cokcu for a generalized {absorbant}.

panka.definition: x1 is a park/land reserve managed by community/polity/company x2 for purpose x3.

panlo.definition: x1 is a slice [thin flat portion] of x2 (mass).

panpi.definition: x1 is at peace with x2.
panpi.notes: (cf. jamna; use sarxe, smaji, tugni for most metaphorical extensions, cilce, jamna)

panra.definition: x1 parallels x2 differing only in property x3 (ka; jo'u/fa'u term) by standard/geometry x4.
panra.notes: Also: x1 is parallel to x2, x3 is the only difference between x1 and x2 (= {terpanra} for reordered places); x1 and x2 are alike/similar/congruent.  A parallel involves extreme close similarity/correspondence across the entirety of the things being compared, generally involving multiple properties, with focus placed on one or a small number of differences. See also {pa'a}, {mintu}, {simsa}, {girzu}, {vrici}.

pante.definition: x1 protests/objects to/complains about x2 (event/state) to audience x3 with action x4.
pante.notes: (x4 is an event or tu'a quotation) See also {xarnu}.

panzi.definition: x1 is a [biological] offspring/child/kid/hybrid of parent(s) x2; (adjective:) x1 is filial.

papri.definition: x1 is a [physical] page/leaf of book/document/bound mass of pages x2.
papri.notes: Numbered pages (as in a book) are the sides of a page (= {paprysfe}, {paprysfelai}); a pageful of text (= {papryseltcidu}, {paprytcidylai}). See also {karni}, {pelji}, {prina}, {xatra}, {vreji}, {pezli}, {cukta}, {ciska}.

parbi.definition: x1 (me'o, fraction) is a ratio/rate of x2 (quantity) with respect to x3 (quantity), [x2:x3].
parbi.notes: Also x1 fraction/proportion/quotient; x2 dividend/numerator; x3 divisor/denominator. See also {frinu}, {dilcu}, {mekso}.

pastu.definition: x1 is a robe/tunic/gown/cloak/dress/[coveralls] [a long/full body garment] of material x2.

patfu.definition: x1 is a father of x2; x1 begets/sires/acts paternal towards x2; [not necessarily biological].

patlu.definition: x1 is a potato [an edible tuber] of variety/cultivar x2.
patlu.notes: (use samcu for starchy/tuberous roots that do not reproduce from eyes of tuber); See also {genja}, {jalna}, {samcu}.

patxu.definition: x1 is a pot/kettle/urn/tub/sink, a deep container for contents x2, of material/properties x3.
patxu.notes: (cf. tansi, palne for depth; baktu, botpi for open/lidded)

pelji.definition: x1 is paper from source x2.
pelji.notes: Sheet of paper (= {plekarda} if shape is important, {plebo'o}). See also {karni}, {papri}, {prina}.

pemci.definition: x1 is a poem/verse about plot/theme/subject/pattern x2 by author x3 for intended audience x4.
pemci.notes: x2 may be a convention rather than a subject. See also {prosa}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {finti}, {lisri}, {sanga}.

penbi.definition: x1 is a pen using ink x2 applied by process x3.

pencu.definition: x1 (agent) touches x2 with x3 [a locus on x1 or an instrument] at x4 [a locus on x2].

pendo.definition: x1 is/acts as a friend of/to x2 (experiencer); x2 befriends x1.

penmi.definition: x1 meets/encounters x2 at/in location x3.

pensi.definition: x1 thinks/considers/cogitates/reasons/is pensive about/reflects upon subject/concept x2.
pensi.notes: Also: x1 is thoughtful (one sense); x2 is mental (one sense)/intellectual (one sense) (= {selpei}). See also cmavo list {pe'i}, {jijnu}, {menli}, {morji}, {sidbo}, {jinvi}, se {nabmi}, {minra}, {lanli}, {besna}, {saske}, {skami}.

perli.definition: x1 is a pear [fruit] of species/strain x2.

pesxu.definition: x1 is paste/pulp/dough/mash/mud/slurry [soft, smooth-textured, moist solid] of composition x2.
pesxu.notes: x2: composition including x2, which need not be complete specification. See also {marxa}, {kliti}, {tarla}.

petso.definition: x1 is $10^{15}$ of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

pezli.definition: x1 is a leaf of plant x2; x1 is foliage of x2.

picti.definition: x1 is a trillionth [$10^{-12}$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

pijne.definition: x1 is a pin/peg (needle-shaped tool) for fastening to/piercing x2, of material/properties x3.

pikci.definition: x1 begs/pleads/supplicates/entreats/implores/beseeches/prays [asks with humility] x2 for x3.
pikci.notes: Also importune, petition, plea, solicit; x2 benefactor, patron; x3 boon, favor, gift, alms. See also {cpedu} which is more general as to manner, {pindi}.

pikta.definition: x1 is a ticket entitling x2 to entitlement/privilege x3 (event/state) under conditions x4.

pilji.definition: x1 is the product/total/result of factors/multiplicands (x2 and x3) x2 multiplied by x3.

pilka.definition: x1 is a crust/rind/peel/skin/hide/outer cover of x2.
pilka.notes: (cf. {grute}, {calku}, {skapi} (pilka as a general term includes skapi), {gacri})

pilno.definition: x1 uses/employs x2 [tool, apparatus, machine, agent, acting entity, material] for purpose x3.
pilno.notes: Also utilize; x2 is useful/used productively by x1 to do x3 (= selpli for reordered places); hire/employ (= {le'ipli}, {lejyplicu'a}). (cf. {tutci}, {cabra}, {minji}, {gasnu}, {zukte} for x2, cmavo list {pi'o}, {sazri}, {jibri})

pimlu.definition: x1 is a/the feather/plume(s)/plumage [body-part] of animal/species x2.

pinca.definition: x1 is a/the urine/piss/pee of x2.

pindi.definition: x1 is poor/indigent/impoverished/lacking in goods/possessions/property x2.
pindi.notes: x2 is scanty/meager/lacking for x1. See also {ricfu}, {claxu}, {nitcu}, {pikci}.

pinfu.definition: x1 is a prisoner/captive of x2, restrained/held/confined by means/force x3.

pinji.definition: x1 is a/the clitoris/penis [projecting reproductive organ; body-part] of x2.
pinji.notes: Normally context eliminates need for specificity; otherwise: penis (= {nakpinji}), clitoris (= {fetpinji}). See also {cinse}, {gletu}, {vibna}, {plibu}, {vlagi}, {mabla}, {ganti}.

pinka.definition: x1 (text) is a comment/remark/observation about subject x2 expressed by x3 to audience x4.
pinka.notes: Also: x3 comments/remarks/says x1 about x2 (= terselpinka for reordered places). See also {jinvi}, {cusku}, {zgana}, {lanli}, {bacru}, {ciska}.

pinsi.definition: x1 is a pencil/crayon/stylus applying lead/marking material x2, frame/support [of material] x3.
pinsi.notes: Also writing brush; x1 stimulates substrate medium x2 to display marks; explicitly denoting a standard lead pencil (= {tabypinsi}). (cf. ciska, penbi (unlike the English equivalents, pinsi is the more general term over penbi), burcu, bakri)

pinta.definition: x1 is flat/level/horizontal in gravity/frame of reference x2.

pinxe.definition: x1 (agent) drinks/imbibes beverage/drink/liquid refreshment x2 from/out-of container/source x3.

pipno.definition: x1 is a piano/harpsichord/synthesizer/organ; a keyboard musical instrument.

pixra.definition: x1 is a picture/illustration representing/showing x2, made by artist x3 in medium x4.
pixra.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is pictorial/illustrative; drawing (= {xraselci'a}), x1 draws x2 (= xraci'a/xraci'a), image (= {xratai}), photo (= {kacmyxra}), take a photo (= {kacmyterxra}, {kacmyxragau}, {kacmyxrazu'e}); sculpture, relief (= {blixra}). See also {ciska}, {cinta}, {prina}, {mupli}, {barna}, {skina}.

plana.definition: x1 is plump/fat/obese [excessively thick/bulbous/swollen] by standard x2.

platu.definition: x1 (agent) plans/designs/plots plan/arrangement/plot/[schematic] x2 for state/process x3.
platu.notes: Also invents/organizes; x2 design, scheme; the structure or layout of an object would be represented as a state in x3. See also {cartu}.

pleji.definition: x1 pays/compensates/remunerates/[rewards] payment x2 to recipient/payee x3 for goods/services x4.
pleji.notes: Also x4 commodities; x4 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posle'i}, posyvelyle'i for unambiguous {semantics}); rent (= {jerle'i}, {lejyjbera}). (cf. canja, cnemu, friti, kargu, vecnu, jdima, prali, jerna, sfasa, dunda, jinga, dapma; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, cirko, dirba)

plibu.definition: x1 is a/the pubic area/external genitalia [body-part] of x2.

plini.definition: x1 is a planet revolving around x2 with planetary characteristics x3, orbital parameters x4.

plipe.definition: x1 (agent/object) leaps/jumps/springs/bounds to x2 from x3 reaching height x4 propelled by x5.
plipe.notes: Place structure parallels klama; hence x4 may be a route-like expression. See also {bajra}, {stapa}, {cpare}, {lafti}.

plise.definition: x1 is an apple [fruit] of species/strain x2.

plita.definition: x1 is a plane [2-dimensional shape/form] defined by points x2 (set); x1 is flat/[smooth].
plita.notes: Also: x1 is even/planar/level. (x2 is a set of points at least sufficient to define the plane); See also {xutla}, {sefta}, {tapla}, {karda}, {boxfo}, {pinta}.

plixa.definition: x1 (agent) plows/furrows/tills [cuts into and turns up] x2 with tool x3 propelled by x4.

pluja.definition: x1 is complex/complicated/involved in aspect/property x2 (ka) by standard x3.

pluka.definition: x1 (event/state) seems pleasant to/pleases x2 under conditions x3.

pluta.definition: x1 is a route/path/way/course/track to x2 from x3 via/defined by points including x4 (set).
pluta.notes: A route merely connects origin/destination, but need not be improved in any way; (x4 is a set of points at least sufficient to constrain the route relevantly). (cf. {litru}, {naxle}, {tcana}, {dargu}, {klaji}, ve {klama}; {tadji}, {zukte} for means to a goal, {klama}, {pagre})

polje.definition: x1 (force) folds/creases x2 at locus/loci/forming crease(s)/bend(s) x3.
polje.notes: For agentive folding (= {plogau}, {plozu'e}); use cardinal-value sumti in x3, or rapli, to indicate multiple folds. See also {korcu}, {cinje}, {boxfo}, {boxna}.

polno.definition: x1 reflects Polynesian/Oceanian (geographic region) culture/nationality/languages in aspect x2.

ponjo.definition: x1 reflects Japanese culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

ponse.definition: x1 possesses/owns/has x2 under law/custom x3; x1 is owner/proprietor of x2 under x3.
ponse.notes: (x3 is generally more important to the concept than commonly accepted for the English equivalent, since the concept is broader when unconstrained, and the nature/interpretation of possession/ownership is very culturally dependent); See also {ckini}, {ralte}, {jitro}, {steci}, {srana}, {tutra}, {turni}, {zivle}.

porsi.definition: x1 [ordered set] is sequenced/ordered/listed by comparison/rules x2 on unordered set x3.
porsi.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is serial. (sets are completely specified); See also cmavo list {po'i}, {lidne}, {liste}, {cmima}.

porto.definition: x1 reflects Portuguese culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

prali.definition: x1 is a profit/gain/benefit/advantage to x2 accruing/resulting from activity/process x3.
prali.notes: Also (fe) x2 profits from x3 (= selterprali for reordered places); x1 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= selposprali for unambiguous {semantics}). See also {vecnu}, {cnemu}, {pleji}, {jinga}, {canja}, {sfasa}, {jerna}, {jdima}, {dunda}, {zivle}.

prami.definition: x1 loves/feels strong affectionate devotion towards x2 (object/state).
prami.notes: Also: x1 is loving towards x2, x1 is a lover of x2 (one sense), x2 is beloved by x1 (= selpa'i for reordered places). See also {cinmo}, {xebni}, {nelci}, {djica}, {sinma}, {pluka}, {kurji}, {pendo}, {speni}.

preja.definition: x1 spreads/expands over/into x2 from initial state x3.

prenu.definition: x1 is a person/people (noun) [not necessarily human]; x1 displays personality/a persona.

preti.definition: x1 (quoted text) is a question/query about subject x2 by questioner x3 to audience x4.

prije.definition: x1 is wise/sage about matter x2 (abstraction) to observer x3.

prina.definition: x1 is a print/impression/image on/in surface x2 of/made by/using tool/press/implement/object x3.

pritu.definition: x1 is to the right/right-hand side of x2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x3.
pritu.notes: Also: x3 is the standard of orientation for x2. See also cmavo list {ri'u}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}, {zunle}.

prosa.definition: x1 is prose about plot/theme/subject x2 by author x3 for intended audience x4.
prosa.notes: Non-poetic written text, without intentional rhyme or meter; x2 may be a convention rather than a subject. See also {cfika}, {lisri}, {cukta}, {pemci}, {finti}.

pruce.definition: x1 is a process with inputs x2, outputs/results x3, passing through steps/stages x4.
pruce.notes: x2 resource (= selru'e, but also ru'etci, (ru'er-/ruc- or selru'e-/selruc- modifying:) selxaksu, selsabji, livla). See also cmavo list {pu'e}, {farvi}, {tadji}, {grute}, {tcini}.

pruxi.definition: x1 is spiritual/pertains to the soul in nature [either energy or being]; x1 is ghostly/ethereal.

pulce.definition: x1 is dust/precipitate [suspensible solid] from x2 in medium/on surface x3.

pulji.definition: x1 is a police officer/[enforcer/vigilante] enforcing law(s)/rule(s)/order x2.
pulji.notes: Police officer, as an agent of authority (= {ca'irpulji}, {ka'irpulji}), as part of a police force (= {puljysoi}, as part of {puljyselsoi}); military police (= {jempulji}, {bilpulji}). See also {catni}, {sonci}, {bilni}, {flalu}, {bandu}, {jemna}, {zekri}, {krati}.

pulni.definition: x1 is a pulley [tool] for performing action/function x2 rotating on axle x3.

punji.definition: x1 (agent) puts/places/sets x2 on/at surface/locus x3.

punli.definition: x1 is a swelling/protrusion/convexity [shape/form] at/in/on x2, of material x3.

purci.definition: x1 is in the past of/earlier than/before x2 in time sequence; x1 is former; x2 is latter.
purci.notes: Time ordering only (use lidne otherwise); aorist in that x1 may overlap in time with x2 as long as it starts before, x1 starts before x2 but is continuing during x2 (= {cfaprucabna}); non-aorist before, i.e. x1 is over/ended before x2 starts (= {fampru}), x1 is completed before x2 starts (= {mulpru}). See also {lidne}, {balvi}, {cabna}, {farna}.

purdi.definition: x1 is a garden/tended/cultivated field of family/community/farmer x2 growing plants/crop x3.

purmo.definition: x1 is a powder of material x2.

racli.definition: x1 (action/activity/behavior) is sane/rational by standard x2.

ractu.definition: x1 is a rabbit/hare/[doe] of species/breed x2.

radno.definition: x1 is x2 radian(s) [metric unit] in angular measure (default is 1) by standard x3.
radno.notes: Measured in degrees ({julra'o}); right ascension astronomical measurement. (= {cacryra'o}). See also {jganu}, {kilto}, {centi}, {decti}, {dekto}, {femti}, {gigdo}, {gocti}, {gotro}, {gutci}, {litce}, {megdo}, {mikri}, {milti}, {minli}, {nanvi}, {petso}, {picti}, {terto}, {xatsi}, {xecto}, {xexso}, {zepti}, {zetro}.

rafsi.definition: x1 is an affix/suffix/prefix/combining-form for word/concept x2, form/properties x3, language x4.

ragve.definition: x1 is located across/on the other side of gap/boundary x2 from x3; x1 is opposite (fi) x3.
ragve.notes: Also: x1 is over there (across/beyond zo'e); directly across/beyond a boundary/gap, generally at the shortest plausible distance on the other side of the boundary. See also {dukti}, {kuspe}, {bancu}, {kruca}, {cripu}, {pagre}.

rakso.definition: x1 reflects Iraqi culture/nationality in aspect x2.

raktu.definition: x1 (object/person/event/situation) troubles/disturbs x2 (person) causing problem(s) x3.
raktu.notes: Also afflicts, is disruptive to, troublesome; x1/x3 are a care to x2, x2 is troubled by/cares about x1/x3 (= selra'u for reordered places). See also {dicra}, {fanza}, {zunti}, {kurji}, {xanka}.

ralci.definition: x1 is delicate/fragile/subtle/refined in property x2 (ka).
ralci.notes: Easily damaged or rendered less pleasing/pure/effective. See also {jdari}, {ranti}, {tsali}, {milxe}, {kukte}.

ralju.definition: x1 is principal/chief/leader/main/[staple], most significant among x2 (set) in property x3 (ka).
ralju.notes: Staple (= {ralselpra}); general/admiral/president/principal leader (= ralja'a, ralterbe'e; use additional terms to distinguish among these); also primary, prime, (adverb:) chiefly, principally, mainly; (x2 is complete specification of set). See also {vajni}, te {bende}, {minde}, {lidne}, {jatna}, {jitro}, {gidva}, {midju}.

ralte.definition: x1 retains/keeps/holds x2 in its possession.

randa.definition: x1 yields/gives way/surrenders to x2 (force/agent) under conditions x3.

rango.definition: x1 is a/the body organ [body-part] of body/species x2 performing function x3.

ranji.definition: x1 (event/state) continues/persists over interval x2; x1 (property - ka) is continuous over x2.

ranmi.definition: x1 is a myth/legend, a culturally significant story about x2 in mythos x3 of culture x4.
ranmi.notes: Also: x1 is mythical/fairy tale; used adjectivally for non-humanoid creatures (= {ramda'u}) of story/myth/legend/religion, e.g. dragon; fairy tale (= {veryranmi}). See also {lijda}, {lisri}, {crida}.

ransu.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of bronze of composition including x2.

ranti.definition: x1 is soft/malleable/moldable/yielding to force x2 in conditions x3.

ranxi.definition: x1 is ironic(al)/contrary to expectation x2 in state/property/aspect x3.

rapli.definition: x1 [action] repeats/is repeated for a total of x2 (quantity) occurrences.

rarna.definition: x1 is natural/spontaneous/instinctive, not [consciously] caused by person(s).

ratcu.definition: x1 is a rat of species/breed x2.

ratni.definition: x1 is an atom of element/atomic number x2 of isotope number/atomic weight x3.
ratni.notes: (cf. kantu for a basic unit of a property or activity; selci for a basic physical subunit, generally of a mass)

rebla.definition: x1 is a/the tail/appendix [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: trailing, following portion/appendage].

rectu.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains meat/flesh from source/animal x2.

remna.definition: x1 is a human/human being/man (non-specific gender-free sense); (adjective:) x1 is human.

renro.definition: x1 throws/launches/casts/hurls x2 to/at/in direction x3 (propulsion derives internally to x1).

renvi.definition: x1 survives/endures/undergoes/abides/lasts/persists through x2 for interval/duration x3.
renvi.notes: Also lasts out, withstands; x1 persists/lasts for duration x3; (adjective:) x1 is tough/durable. See also {ranji}, {kuspe}, {randa}, {lifri}, {stali}, {temci}.

respa.definition: x1 is a reptile of species/breed x2.

ricfu.definition: x1 is rich/wealthy in goods/possessions/property/aspect x2.

rigni.definition: x1 is repugnant to/causes disgust to x2 under conditions x3.

rijno.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of silver/argentum (Ag); [metaphor: valuable, tarnishing].

rilti.definition: x1 (sequence/non-text quote) is a rhythm/beat of music/expressive form x2.
rilti.notes: Not necessarily oscillatory/regular pattern. See also {damri}, {pemci}, {tonga}, {zgike}, {slilu}, {dikni}, {sanga}, {morna}.

rimni.definition: x1 rhymes/alliterates with x2 in language/phonetics x3, matching sound correspondence x4 (ka).
rimni.notes: Broad meaning of rhyme - any matching sound correspondence. See also {pemci}, {sanga}.

rinci.definition: x1 liquid/fluid drains/strains/flushes from source x2 through drain/strainer x3 by force x4.
rinci.notes: x4 is usually gravity. See also {pambe}, {tisna}, {setca}, {flecu}, {muvdu}, {ganxo}, {rirxe}.

rinju.definition: x1 is restrained/held [back]/constrained/kept by restraint x2 against x3 (event).
rinju.notes: Also: x2 is a restraint/binding for x1, x2 keeps/restrains/holds [back]/constrains x1 from x3 (= selri'u for reordered places); agentive restraint (= {ri'urgau}, {ri'urzu'e}). See also {zifre}, {ralte}, {pinfu}, {kavbu}, {fanta}, {jgari}, {jimte}, {bapli}, {curmi}, {kluza}, {tagji}.

rinka.definition: x1 (event/state) effects/physically causes effect x2 (event/state) under conditions x3.
rinka.notes: x1 is a material condition for x2; x1 gives rise to x2. See also {gasnu}, {krinu}, {nibli}, te {zukte}, se {jalge}, {bapli}, {jitro}, cmavo list {ri'a}, {mukti}, {ciksi}, {xruti}.

rinsa.definition: x1 (agent) greets/hails/[welcomes/says hello to]/responds to arrival of x2 in manner x3 (action).
rinsa.notes: (cf. friti for welcome/hospitality, cmavo list coi, cmavo list co'o)

rirci.definition: x1 [member] is rare/unusual/uncommon/atypical in property x2 (ka) among members of x3 (set).
rirci.notes: (x3 is complete specification of set); (cf. cizra, fadni, cafne, kampu, cnano - the generalized opposite to any/all of these concepts)

rirni.definition: x1 is a parent of/raises/rears x2; x1 mentors/acts parental toward child/protege x2.

rirxe.definition: x1 is a river of land mass x2, draining watershed x3 into x4/terminating at x4.
rirxe.notes: (cf. flecu, senta for most metaphorical aspects; daplu, djacu, lalxu, xamsi, rinci, naxle)

rismi.definition: x1 is a quantity of rice [a type of grain] of strain/cultivar x2.

risna.definition: x1 is a/the heart [body-part] of x2; [emotional/shape metaphors are NOT culturally neutral].
risna.notes: (adjective:) x1 is cardiac; emotional 'heart' (= {cnise'i}). See also {pambe}, {ciblu}.

ritli.definition: x1 is a rite/ceremony/ritual for purpose/goal x2, by custom/in community x3, with form/rules x4.
ritli.notes: [also: x1 is formal, Legal. x1 is 'going through the motions']; x4 constraints/customs; See also {lijda}, {malsi}, {flalu}, {javni}, {tcaci}, {clite}, {junri}.

rivbi.definition: x1 avoids/evades/shuns/escapes/skirts [fate] x2 (event) through action/state x3 (event).
rivbi.notes: Also detours around, stays away from; (x1 is normally an object, but may be an event). See also bandu which is not necessarily successful, {fanta}, which is agentive, se jersi which implies an opposing agent, {sisku}, {kalte}, {fapro}.

rokci.definition: x1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains rock/stone of type/composition x2 from location x3.
