rokci.notes: x2: composition including x2, which need not be complete specification. See also {kunra}, {jemna}, {canre}.

romge.definition: x1 is a highly reflective/polished non-tarnishing metallic surface, of metal x2 [often chromium].

ropno.definition: x1 reflects European culture/nationality/geography/Indo-European languages in aspect x2.

rorci.definition: x1 engenders/procreates/begets x2 with coparent x3.

rotsu.definition: x1 is thick in dimension/direction x2 by standard x3; [relatively long in smallest dimension].

rozgu.definition: x1 is a rose [flower - characterized by prickly stem/fragrance] of species/strain x2.
rozgu.notes: Roses are not all pink; avoid using for color rose, which might be labyxu'e. See also {spati}, {xunre}.

ruble.definition: x1 is weak/feeble/frail in property/quality/aspect x2 (ka) by standard x3.

runme.definition: x1 melts [becomes liquid from solid state] at temperature x2 and pressure x3.

runta.definition: x1 dissolves in solvent x2 forming solution/[suspension] x3 under conditions x4.

rupnu.definition: x1 is measured in major-money-units (dollar/yuan/ruble) as x2 (quantity), monetary system x3.
rupnu.notes: Also pound, rupee, franc, mark, yen; x1 is generally a price/cost/value. See also {jdini}, {sicni}, {jdima}, {vecnu}, {fepni}, {dekpu}, {gutci}, {minli}, {merli}, {bunda}, {kramu}.

rusko.definition: x1 reflects Russian culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

rutni.definition: x1 is an artifact; x1 is artificial; x1 is made/caused by people/se kulnu x2; x1 is man-made.

sabnu.definition: x1 is a cabin of vehicle x2.

sacki.definition: x1 is a match [incendiary device] made of x2.

saclu.definition: x1 (me'o) is the [decimal/binary] equivalent of fractional x2 (me'o) in base x3 (quantity).
saclu.notes: Conversion from fractions to decimal-point based notation. See also {namcu}, {frinu}.

sadjo.definition: x1 reflects Saudi Arabian culture/nationality in aspect x2.

sakci.definition: x1 sucks/is suction/vacuum/relatively low pressure of fluid/gas x2 relative to high pressure x3.
sakci.notes: Also suck object/fluid (= sakcpu or {sakmuvgau}). See also {cokcu}, {lacpu}, {flecu}.

sakli.notes: x2 is slick/slippery to/for x1 (= selsakli for reordered places). See also {mosra}, {fulta}, {skiji}, {xutla}.

sakta.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of sugar [sweet edible] from source x2 of composition x3.
sakta.notes: Also sucrose, fructose, glucose, galactose, lactose, etc.; saccharine/aspartame/sugar substitute (basysakta or sakybasti, ticysakta); x3: composition including x3, which need not be complete specification. See also {silna}, {titla}.

salci.definition: x1 celebrates/recognizes/honors x2 (event/abstract) with activity/[party] x3.
salci.notes: x3 (and nunsla) festival/fiesta/celebration/occasion/fair/Holiday (some senses). not limited to the ameliorative interpretation of 'celebrate': funeral (= {mrobixsla}). See also {sinma}, {jbena}.

salpo.definition: x1 is sloped/inclined/slanted/aslant with angle x2 to horizon/frame x3.
salpo.notes: Also steep (= {tcesa'o}); normally implies non-rectilinear. See also {kurfa}, {tutci}.

salta.definition: x1 (mass) is a quantity of salad [food] with ingredients/components including x2.
salta.notes: x2 is in x1, an ingredient/part/component of x1. See also {mixre}, {stasu}.

samcu.definition: x1 is a quantity of cassava/taro/manioc/tapioca/yam [edible starchy root] of species/strain x2.

sampu.definition: x1 is simple/unmixed/uncomplicated in property x2 (ka).

sance.definition: x1 is sound produced/emitted by x2.

sanga.definition: x1 sings/chants x2 [song/hymn/melody/melodic sounds] to audience x3.
sanga.notes: Melody (= {sagzgi}, {ralsagzgi}), harmony (= {saxsagzgi}), harmonize/sing harmony (= {saxsa'a}), song (= {selsa'a}). See also {pemci}, {rimni}, {rilti}, {siclu}.

sanji.definition: x1 is conscious/aware of x2 (object/abstract); x1 discerns/recognizes x2 (object/abstract).
sanji.notes: [also: x1 knows Of. x2 (one sense); awareness implies some amount of mental processing above and beyond mere sensory detection, and may also be applied to mental relationships that are not detected by the senses]; See also {menli}, {morji}, {ganse}, {sipna}, {cikna}.

sanli.definition: x1 stands [is vertically oriented] on surface x2 supported by limbs/support/pedestal x3.
sanli.notes: x1 is standing; x1 stands up; x1 is erect/vertical/upright; x1 bows/bends over (= {krosa'i}, {krosa'ibi'o}, {plosa'i}); frame of reference is (approximate) perpendicularity to the surface, and not to a gravity field. See also {kamju}, {sraji}, {tuple}, {zbepi}, {sarji}.

sanmi.definition: x1 (mass) is a meal composed of dishes including x2.
sanmi.notes: x2 is a course/dish of meal x1 (= selsai for reordered places). See also {barja}, {stasu}, {gusta}, {sanso}.

sanso.definition: x1 is a sauce/topping/gravy/frosting for use with x2, containing ingredient(s) including x3.
sanso.notes: x3 is in x1, an ingredient/part/component of sauce x1. See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {stasu}.

santa.definition: x1 is an umbrella/parasol shielding x2 from x3, made of material x4, supported by x5.

sarcu.definition: x1 (abstract) is necessary/required for continuing state/process x2 under conditions x3.
sarcu.notes: Also factually necessary, necessity, prerequisite, condition, precondition. See also cmavo list {sau}, {nitcu}.

sarji.definition: x1 supports/holds up/is underpinning of/[helps] x2 against force/opposition x3 with/by means x4.
sarji.notes: Also aids; (adjective:) x1 is dependable, reliable (such reliability may be transient; this is not the usual sense of 'reliable' or 'dependable'); (x2 is object/event). See also {bradi}, {darlu}, {fapro}, {sidju}, {tugni}, {bongu}, {ckana}, {cpana}, {loldi}, {sanli}, {selfu}.

sarlu.definition: x1 is a spiral/helix/whorl/[vortex] [shape/form] with limits x2, of dimensionality x3.

sarxe.definition: x1 is harmonious/concordant/in agreement/concord with x2 in property x3 (ka).

saske.definition: x1 (mass of facts) is science of/about subject matter x2 based on methodology x3.
saske.notes: Not limited to science as derived by the scientific method, but pertaining to any body of usually-coherent knowledge garnered/gathered/assembled by a consistent methodology. See also {datni}, {fatci}, {djuno}, {cipra}, {pensi}, {jimpe}.

satci.definition: x1 [measurement/match] is exact/precise to precision x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni).

savru.definition: x1 is a noise/din/clamor [sensory input without useful information] to x2 via sensory channel x3.

sazri.definition: x1 operates/drives/runs x2 [apparatus/machine] with goal/objective/use/end/function x3.

sefta.definition: x1 is surface/face [bounded shape/form] of [higher-dimension] object x2, on side x3, edges x4.

selci.definition: x1 is a cell/atom/unit/molecule of x2; x1 is an indivisible, most basic subunit of x2.
selci.notes: (x2 generally has mass nature); (cf. kantu for properties, activities; ratni, gradu)

selfu.definition: x1 (agent) serves x2 with service x3 (activity); x1 is a servant (noun) of x2 performing x3.

semto.definition: x1 reflects Semitic [metaphor: Middle-Eastern] language/culture/nationality in aspect x2.
semto.notes: Semitic includes Arabic, Hebrew, Aramaic, and Ethiopian, among others. See also {xrabo}.

senpi.definition: x1 doubts/is dubious/doubtful/skeptical/questions that x2 (du'u) is true.
senpi.notes: Also: x2 is doubtful/dubious/questionable (= selsenpi for reordered places). See also {jinvi}, {krici}, {djuno}, {birti}.

senta.definition: x1 is a layer/stratum [shape/form] of x2 [material] within structure/continuum/composite x3.

senva.definition: x1 dreams about/that x2 (fact/idea/event/state); x2 is a dream/reverie of x1.

sepli.definition: x1 is apart/separate from x2, separated by partition/wall/gap/interval/separating medium x3.
sepli.notes: Also aloof (= {jiksei}); alone (= rolsmisei meaning apart or unlike all others of its kind; pavysei, seirpavmei meaning "only" or "one alone" - do not use when talking about, for example, two people who are alone); x3 space. See also {bitmu}, {snuji}, {senta}, {fendi}, {curve}, {jinsa}, {bitmu}, {marbi}.

serti.definition: x1 are stairs/stairway/steps for climbing structure x2 with steps x3.

setca.definition: x1 (agent) inserts/interposes/puts/deposits x2 into interior x3/into among/between members of x3.
setca.notes: Insertion need not imply a significant degree of 'filling'; inject (= {je'erse'a}); syringe/needle (= {se'arterje'e}, {je'erse'atci}, jestu'u or {tu'urjesni}); also pour, inflate, stuff, fill. See also {rinci}, {tisna}, {punji}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {jmina}, {culno}, {kunti}, {catlu}.

sevzi.definition: x1 is a self/ego/id/identity-image of x2.

sfani.definition: x1 is a fly [a small non-stinging flying insect] of species/breed x2.

sfasa.definition: x1 (agent) punishes x2 for infraction x3 (event/state/action) with punishment x4 (event/state).
sfasa.notes: Also chastise, castigate, chasten, discipline, correct (one sense); also x4 penalty. See also {cnemu}, {pleji}, {venfu}, {zekri}, {canja}, {dunda}, {jdima}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {dapma}, {cirko}, {jinga}.

sfubu.definition: x1 dives/swoops [manner of controlled falling] to x2 from x3.

siclu.definition: x1 [sound source] whistles/makes whistling sound/note/tone/melody x2.

sicni.definition: x1 is a coin/token/is specie issued by x2 having value x3 of composition including x4.

sidbo.definition: x1 (idea abstract) is an idea/concept/thought about x2 (object/abstract) by thinker x3.
sidbo.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is ideal/ideational. See also {ciksi}, {jijnu}, {mucti}, {jinvi}, {nabmi}, {pensi}, {xanri}, cmavo list {si'o}.

sidju.definition: x1 helps/assists/aids object/person x2 do/achieve/maintain event/activity x3.

sigja.definition: x1 is a cigar/cigarette/cigarillo made from tobacco/smokable substance x2 by x3.

silka.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of silk produced by x2.

silna.definition: x1 is a portion/quantity of salt from source x2, of composition including x3.

simlu.definition: x1 seems/appears to have property(ies) x2 to observer x3 under conditions x4.
simlu.notes: Also: x1 seems like it has x2 to x3; suggest belief/observation (= {mlugau}, {mluti'i}); looks like/resembles (= {smimlu}, {mitmlu}). See also {catlu}, {viska}, {simsa}, {zgana}, {ganse}, {jarco}.

simsa.definition: x1 is similar/parallel to x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni); x1 looks/appears like x2.
simsa.notes: Also: x1 is a likeness/image of x2; x1 and x2 are alike; similarity and parallel differ primarily in emphasis. See also {dunli}, {frica}, {mintu}, {panra}, {simlu}, {vrici}.

simxu.definition: x1 (set) has members who mutually/reciprocally x2 (event [x1 should be reflexive in 1+ sumti]).
simxu.notes: Members of x1 do to each other/one another x2, and in return do x2; x1 (plural set) do the same thing x2 to each other. See also {kampu}, {mintu}.

since.definition: x1 is a snake/serpent of species/breed x2.

sinma.definition: x1 esteems/respects/venerates/highly regards x2 [object of respect].
sinma.notes: Also: x2 is respected/esteemed/celebrated (= selsi'a for reordered places). See also {banli}, {censa}, {misno}, {nelci}, {prami}, {salci}, {jgira}.

sinso.definition: x1 is the trigonometric sine of angle/arcsine x2.

sinxa.definition: x1 is a sign/symbol/signal representing/referring/signifying/meaning x2 to observer x3.
sinxa.notes: Also: x1 signifies x2; (adjective:) x1 is significant/meaningful/of import; signal an action (= {sniti'i}), connotation (= se {sibyti'isni}, {sibyti'ismu}). See also {lerfu}, {tcita}, {barna}, {mifra}, {smuni}.

sipna.definition: x1 is asleep (adjective); x1 sleeps/is sleeping.

sirji.definition: x1 is straight/direct/line segment/interval between x2 and x3; (adjective:) x1 is linear.

sirxo.definition: x1 reflects Syrian culture/nationality in aspect x2.

sisku.definition: x1 seeks/searches/looks for property x2 among set x3 (complete specification of set).
sisku.notes: If searching for an object or an event, use tu'a in x2. See also {cirko}, {kalte}, {kavbu}, {kucli}, {rivbi}, {manci}, {facki}.

sisti.definition: x1 [agent] ceases/stops/halts/ends activity/process/state x2 [not necessarily completing it].

sitna.definition: x1 cites/quotes/refers to/makes reference to source x2 for information/statement x3 (du'u).

sivni.definition: x1 is private/personal/privy/[secret/confidential/confined] to x2; x1 is not-public/hidden.
sivni.notes: Also: x1 is secret (one sense); x2 is in the know/in touch with/privy to x1 (= selsivni for reordered places); exclusion can be expressed by na'e(bo) in x2: excluded/in the dark (= {nalselsivni}). See also {gubni}, {mipri}.

skaci.definition: x1 is a skirt/kilt/dress of material x2; x1 is skirted [garment open at the bottom; not legged].
skaci.notes: A skirted garment may be full length (pastu), but must hang below the waist from support above or at the waist. See also {taxfu}, {palku}.

skami.definition: x1 is a computer for purpose x2.

skapi.definition: x1 is a pelt/skin/hide/leather from x2.

skari.definition: x1 is/appears to be of color/hue x2 as perceived/seen by x3 under conditions x4.
skari.notes: Conditions may include lighting, background, etc.. See also {blanu}, {bunre}, {cicna}, {cinta}, {crino}, {grusi}, {narju}, {nukni}, {pelxu}, {xunre}, {zirpu}, {carmi}, {kandi}, {xekri}, {blabi}.

skicu.definition: x1 tells about/describes x2 (object/event/state) to audience x3 with description x4 (property).

skiji.definition: x1 is a ski/skid/skate/runner for surface (of material) x2 supporting skier/skater/sled/cargo x3.

skina.definition: x1 is a cinema/movie/film about x2 [plot/theme/subject/activity], filmmaker x3, for audience x4.
skina.notes: Also motion picture; x2 may be a convention rather than a subject; cartoon/animation (= selxraci'a {skina}); television/tv show (= tivyskina, regardless of length, factual content, etc.). See also {tivni}, {vidni}, {pixra}, {finti}.

skori.definition: x1 is cord/cable/rope/line/twine/cordage/woven strands of material x2.

skoto.definition: x1 reflects Gaelic/Scottish culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.
skoto.notes: Irish (= {sicko'o}), Scottish (= {sunko'o}), Celtic (= {dzeko'o}), Welsh (= {nanko'o}), Breton (= {fasko'o}); since Scottish/Gaelic is only the northern branch of the Celtic tribes, many would prefer a fu'ivla for Celtic; nationalism might also demand a separate fu'ivla for Irish. See also {brito}, {glico}.

skuro.definition: x1 is a groove/trench/furrow [shape/form] in object/surface x2.

slabu.definition: x1 is old/familiar/well-known to observer x2 in feature x3 (ka) by standard x4.
slabu.notes: This can cover both meanings of old. Old in years, i.e. age, can be conveyed through x2 = the world, life, existence (= loi nu {zasti}); in usage this has been a common default for ellipsis. However slabu is not the opposite of 'young' (= {nalci'o}, {tolci'o}), but the opposite of 'new' (= {tolni'o}); also ancient (= {tcesau}), age (= {nilsau}); x2 is used to x1 (= selsau for reordered places); historic/historical (= {cirsau}, {cirselcedra}; also {vaipru}). (cf. {clani}, {citno}, {cnino}, se {djuno}; not the opposite of {citno}, {djuno})

slaka.definition: x1 is a syllable in language x2.

slami.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of acid of composition x2; (adjective:) x1 is acidic.
slami.notes: x2: composition including x2, which need not be complete specification. See also {slari}, {nimre}.

slanu.definition: x1 is a cylinder [shape/form] of material x2.

slari.definition: x1 is sour/tart to observer x2.

slasi.definition: x1 is a quantity of/is made of/contains plastic/polymer of type/component unit(s) x2.

sligu.definition: x1 is solid, of composition/material including x2, under conditions x3.
sligu.notes: Conditions include temperature and pressure. See also {runta}, {litki}, {gapci}, {jdari}, {dunja}, {pulce}, {jduli}.

slilu.definition: x1 oscillates at rate/frequency x2 through set/sequence-of-states x3 (complete specification).
slilu.notes: Also (expressible either with desku or slilu): side to side, to and fro, back and forth, reciprocal (motion), rotates, revolves. See also {dikni}, {rilti}, {morna}, {desku}, {janbe}, {boxna}.

sliri.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of sulfur/brimstone (S); [metaphor: foul odor, volcanic].

slovo.definition: x1 reflects Slavic language/culture/ethos in aspect x2.

sluji.definition: x1 is a/the muscle [body-part] controlling x2, of body x3; [metaphor: tools of physical power].
sluji.notes: (adjective:) x1/x2/x3 is muscular (different senses). See also {rectu}, {xadni}, {zajba}.

sluni.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains onions/scallions of type/cultivar x2.

smacu.definition: x1 is a mouse of species/breed x2.

smadi.definition: x1 guesses/conjectures/surmises x2 (du'u) is true about subject x3; [epistemology].
smadi.notes: Also: x1 has a hunch that x2 is true; x1 imagines x2 is true; words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {djuno}, {facki}, {jijnu}, {sruma}.

smaji.definition: x1 (source) is quiet/silent/[still] at observation point x2 by standard x3.

smani.definition: x1 is a monkey/ape/simian/baboon/chimpanzee of species/breed x2.

smoka.definition: x1 is a sock/stocking [flexible foot and lower leg garment] of material x2.

smuci.definition: x1 is a spoon/scoop (tool) for use x2, made of material x3.

smuni.definition: x1 is a meaning/interpretation of x2 recognized/seen/accepted by x3.

snada.definition: x1 [agent] succeeds in/achieves/completes/accomplishes x2 as a result of effort/attempt/try x3.
snada.notes: Also: x1 reaches x2; (adjective:) x1 is successful; x2 (event/state/achievement). See also {fliba}, {troci}, {jgira}.

snanu.definition: x1 is to the south/southern side of x2 according to frame of reference x3.

snidu.definition: x1 is x2 seconds in duration (default is 1 second) by standard x3.

snime.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity/expanse of snow.

snipa.definition: x1 adheres/sticks to x2; (adjective:) x1 is sticky/gummy/adhesive.
snipa.notes: Note that x1 is the adhering surface being claimed; x2 need not be sticky. See also {tarla}, {viknu}.

snuji.definition: x1 is a sandwich/layering [not restricted to food] of x2 sandwiched between x3.

snura.definition: x1 is secure/safe from threat x2 (event).

snuti.definition: x1 (event/state) is an accident/unintentional on the part of x2; x1 is an accident.

sobde.definition: x1 is a quantity of soya [grain/bean] of species/strain x2.

sodna.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of alkali metal of type x2 [default sodium].
sodna.notes: Also potassium, lithium, cesium. Soda. See also {jilka}, {jinme}.

sodva.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of a carbonated beverage/soda of flavor/brand x2.
sodva.notes: Also: soft drink (though this sometimes includes tea and coffee as distinct from alcoholic beverages which are "hard drinks"). See also {jilka}, {jinme}.

softo.definition: x1 reflects Russian empire/USSR/ex-USSR (Soviet]/CIS culture/nationality in aspect x2.

solji.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of gold (Au); [metaphor: valuable, heavy, non-reactive].

solri.definition: x1 is the sun of home planet x2 (default Earth) of race x3; (adjective:) x1 is solar.
solri.notes: 'home planet' refers to a planet which is "home" to a race, but not necessarily the original "home" of a species if that species inhabits many worlds. See also {gusni}, {lunra}, {mluni}, {plini}, {santa}, {terdi}, {tarci}.

sonci.definition: x1 is a soldier/warrior/fighter of army x2.

sorcu.definition: x1 is a store/deposit/supply/reserve of materials/energy x2 in containment x3.
sorcu.notes: x3 need not be a container, but could merely be a site/location restriction; e.g. a heap. The sumti indicates how the supply is identified and distinguished from other occurrences of the stored x2 that are not part of the store. (cf. panka; vreji for information storage; sabji for a store or reserve that is not necessarily tied to a site, banxa, panka)

sorgu.definition: x1 is a quantity of sorghum of species/strain x2.

sovda.definition: x1 is an egg/ovum/sperm/pollen/gamete of/from organism [mother/father] x2.
sovda.notes: (poorly metaphorical only due to gender- and species- being unspecified): ovoid, oblate (= pevyso'aseltai, but better: claboi); egg, specifically female (= {fetso'a}), of a bird (= {cpifetso'a}, {cpiso'a}), of a chicken (= jipcyfetso'a, jipcyso'a. (but note that Lojban does not require specificity, just as English doesn't for either milk or eggs; "sovda" is fine for most contexts); If fertilized, then tsiju or tarbi. (cf. ganti, gutra, mamta, patfu, rorci, tsiju, lanbi, tarbi; also djine, konju for shape, tarbi)

spaji.definition: x1 (event/action abstract) surprises/startles/is unexpected [and generally sudden] to x2.

spali.definition: x1 (agent) polishes object/surface x2 with polish x3, applied using tool x4.

spano.definition: x1 reflects Spanish-speaking culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.
spano.notes: Metaphorical restriction to Spain by contrast with xispo (comparable to the distinction between glico and merko/sralo/brito/kadno); Spain (= {sangu'e}); Spanish dialects spoken in Spain, especially Castillian (= {sansanbau}). See also {xispo}, {ketco}, {mexno}, {gento}.

spati.definition: x1 is a plant/herb/greenery of species/strain/cultivar x2.
spati.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is vegetable/vegetal/vegetative. See also {genja}, {grute}, {gurni}, {latna}, {rozgu}, {stagi}, {tricu}, {tsiju}, {tujli}, {xruba}, {xrula}, {pezli}, {srasu}.

speni.definition: x1 is married to x2; x1 is a spouse of x2 under law/custom/tradition/system/convention x3.

spisa.definition: x1 [object/substance] is a piece/portion/lump/chunk/particle of x2 [substance].

spita.definition: x1 is a hospital treating patient(s) x2 for condition/injuries/disease/illness x3.
spita.notes: Hospice (a place where x2 of spita is lenu mrobi'o = mrospita). See also {bilma}, {mikce}.

spofu.definition: x1 is broken/inoperable/broken down/non-utile/not usable for function x2.
spofu.notes: Agentive break, cause to become inoperable (= {pofygau}, {pofyzu'e}); accidentally break, as a result of an event, non-agentive (= {pofyja'e}, {nutpo'uja'e}). See also {daspo}, {katna}, {porpi}, {se} {xrani}, {cikre}.

spoja.definition: x1 bursts/explodes/violently breaks up/decomposes/combusts into pieces/energy/fragments x2.

spuda.definition: x1 answers/replies to/responds to person/object/event/situation/stimulus x2 with response x3.
spuda.notes: x3 also answer/reply. If x2 is a person/object, it will usually require "tu'a" indicating that the reply/response is to that person/object doing something. "tu'a" may not be needed if the person/object itself is the stimulus, rather than something it is doing. See also {cusku}, {preti}, {nabmi}, {danfu}, {frati}, {cpedu}.

sputu.definition: x1 spits/expectorates x2 [predominantly liquid] from x3 to/onto x4.

sraji.definition: x1 is vertical/upright/erect/plumb/oriented straight up and down in reference frame/gravity x2.

sraku.notes: (cf. guska, katna, mosra, plixa, kakpa (unlike kakpa, sraku does not imply material is removed), spali)

sralo.definition: x1 reflects Australian culture/nationality/geography/dialect in aspect x2.

srana.definition: x1 pertains to/is germane/relevant to/concerns/is related/associated with/is about x2.
srana.notes: Also: x1 is a question of/treats of x2; can be symmetric, although x1 is conventionally more specific or constrained in scope than x2. See also cmavo list {ra'a}, {ckini}, {ponse}, {steci}.

srasu.definition: x1 is a blade/expanse of grass of species x2.

srera.definition: x1 errs in doing/being/making mistake x2 (event), an error under conditions x3 by standard x4.
srera.notes: (cf. drani, which is non-agentive, cfila, fliba)

srito.definition: x1 reflects Sanskrit language/Sanskritic/Vedic culture/nationality in aspect x2.

sruma.definition: x1 assumes/supposes that x2 (du'u) is true about subject x3; [epistemology].
sruma.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. See also {smadi}, {birti}.

sruri.definition: x1 encircles/encloses/is surrounding x2 in direction(s)/dimension(s)/plane x3.
sruri.notes: (jinsru =) x1 is a ring/belt/band/girdle around/circling/ringing x2 near total containment in some dimension(s). See also {karli}, {senta}, {snuji}, {vanbi}, se {nenri}, se {jbini}, {bartu}, {djine}.

stace.definition: x1 is honest/open/truthfully revealing to/candid/frank with x2 about matter/fact x3.

stagi.definition: x1 is the edible x2 portion of plant x3; x1 is a vegetable.
stagi.notes: Note that fruits and nuts are also vegetables; generally this word will be used for either the general category of edible plants, or for non-fruit vegetables (= {nalrutstagi}). See also {grute}, {kobli}, {narge}, {sluni}, {spati}, {sunga}, {tamca}.

staku.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of ceramic made by x2, of composition x3, in form/shape x4.
staku.notes: Made of baked clay or other non-metallic solid; x3: composition including x3, which need not be complete specification. See also {kliti}.

stani.definition: x1 is a/the stalk/stem/trunk [body-part] of plant/species x2; [metaphor: main support].

stapa.definition: x1 steps/treads on/in surface x2 using limbs x3.

stasu.definition: x1 is a quantity of soup/stew/olla/olio [food] of ingredients including x2.
stasu.notes: x2 is in x1, an ingredient/part/component of x1. See also {sanmi}, {mixre}, {salta}, {sanso}.

stati.definition: x1 has a talent/aptitude/innate skill for doing/being x2.

steci.definition: x1 (ka) is specific/particular/specialized/[special]/a defining property of x2 among x3 (set).
steci.notes: [x2 are members/individuals of a subset of x3; object whose association is specific/defining of a subset or individuals (= tecra'a, also cf. cmavo list po'e, [x2 is also special to x1]); also: especially/strongly/specifically associated]; (x3 is completely specified set)]; See also {srana}, se {ponse}, {ckini}, {tcila}, {tutra}.

stedu.definition: x1 is a/the head [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: uppermost portion].

stela.definition: x1 is a lock/seal of/on/for sealing x2 with/by locking mechanism x3.

stero.definition: x1 is x2 steradian(s) [metric unit] in solid angle (default is 1) by standard x3.

stici.definition: x1 is to the west/western side of x2 according to frame of reference x3.

stidi.definition: x1 (agent) suggests/proposes idea/action x2 to audience x3; x1 (event) inspires x2 in/among x3.
stidi.notes: Event which inspires/suggests/is suggestive (= {faurti'i}, {sidyfau}). See also cmavo list {ti'i}, {tcica}, {xlura}.

stika.definition: x1 (event) adjusts/regulates/changes x2 (ka/ni) in amount/degree x3.
stika.notes: Non-resultative, causal change; agentive adjust (= {tikygau}, {tikyzu'e}). See also {cenba} which need not be causal, {galfi} which is causal and resultative, {binxo} which need not be causal but is resultative, {zasni}, {stodi}.

stizu.definition: x1 is a chair/stool/seat/bench, a piece or portion of a piece of furniture intended for sitting.

stodi.definition: x1 is constant/invariant/unchanging in property x2 (ka) in response to stimulus/conditions x3.

stuna.definition: x1 is to the east/eastern side of x2 according to frame of reference x3.

stura.definition: x1 is a structure/arrangement/organization of x2 [set/system/complexity].
stura.notes: (x2, if a set, is completely specified); See also {ganzu}, {morna}, {ciste}, {lujvo}, {greku}, {gerna}.

stuzi.definition: x1 is an inherent/inalienable site/place/position/situation/spot/location of x2 (object/event).
stuzi.notes: Generally used for normally stationary objects/events, to give their 'permanent' location. See also cmavo list {tu'i}, {jmive}, {diklo}, {zvati}, {tcini}, {xabju}, {jibni}, {judri}, {lamji}, {mokca}, {stali}.

sucta.definition: x1 (si'o) is abstracted/generalized/idealized from x2 [something concrete] by rules x3.

sudga.definition: x1 is dry of liquid x2; (adjective:) x1 is arid.

sufti.definition: x1 is a/the hoof [body-part] of x2.

suksa.definition: x1 (event/state) is sudden/sharply changes at stage/point x2 in process/property/function x3.

sumji.definition: x1 is a mathematical sum/result/total of x2 plus/increased by x3.

sumne.definition: x1 (experiencer) smells/scents (transitive verb) x2; x2 smells/has odor/scent to observer x1.

sumti.definition: x1 is a/the argument of predicate/function x2 filling place x3 (kind/number).
sumti.notes: (x1 and x2 are text); See also {bridi}, {darlu}, {gismu}.

sunga.definition: x1 is a quantity of garlic [bulb] of species/strain x2.

sunla.definition: x1 is a quantity of/made from/consists of wool [tight curly hair] from animal/species/source x2.

surla.definition: x1 relaxes/rests/is at ease in/by doing/being x2 (activity).

sutra.definition: x1 is fast/swift/quick/hastes/rapid at doing/being/bringing about x2 (event/state).

tabno.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of carbon/graphite/[diamond]/charcoal; x1 is organic.

tabra.definition: x1 is a horn/trumpet/trombone/bugle [brass-wind/lip-reed musical instrument].

tadji.definition: x1 [process] is a method/technique/approach/means for doing x2 (event) under conditions x3.
tadji.notes: Also practice/way/mode; style/manner/conduct (= {tratadji}); pattern (= {montadji}, {tadjymo'a}, or {platadji}, {tadjypla}). See also {ciste}, {pruce}, {zukte}, {pluta}, cmavo list {ta'i}.

tadni.definition: x1 studies/is a student of x2; x1 is a scholar; (adjective:) x1 is scholarly.

tagji.definition: x1 is snug/tight on x2 in dimension/direction x3 at locus x4.

talsa.definition: x1 (person) challenges x2 at/in property x3.
talsa.notes: (cf. jinga, damba, darlu, jivna, nandu for a challenging event/situation)

tamca.definition: x1 is a tomato [fruit/vegetable/plant] of species/strain x2.

tamji.definition: x1 is a/the thumb/big toe [body-part] on limb x2 of x3; [metaphor based on relative shape].
tamji.notes: Thumb (specifically the hand = xantamji), big toe (= {jmatamji}). See also {degji}, {tance}, {xance}, {jamfu}.

tamne.definition: x1 is cousin to x2 by bond/tie x3; [non-immediate family member, default same generation].
tamne.notes: Probably preferred for metaphorical siblings (over bruna). See also {dzena}, {famti}, {mensi}, {bruna}, {tunba}.

tanbo.definition: x1 is a board/plank [3-dimensional long flat rectangle] of material x2.

tance.definition: x1 is a/the tongue [body-part] of x2; (metaphor: similar to nazbi, tamji, degji).

tanjo.definition: x1 is the trigonometric tangent of angle/arctangent x2.

tanko.definition: x1 is a quantity of tobacco [leaf] of species/strain x2.

tanru.definition: x1 is a binary metaphor formed with x2 modifying x3, giving meaning x4 in usage/instance x5.
tanru.notes: (x2 and x3 are both text or both si'o concept) See also {gismu}, {smuni}.

tansi.definition: x1 is a pan/basin/tub/sink, a shallow container for contents x2, of material/properties x3.
tansi.notes: Also bowl. See also {baktu}, {palne}, {palta}, {patxu}, {kabri} for a bowl that is normally lifted for use, {botpi}.

tanxe.definition: x1 is a box/carton/trunk/crate for contents x2, and made of material x3.

tapla.definition: x1 is a tile/cake [shape/form] of material x2, shape x3, thickness x4.
tapla.notes: A tile is a 3-dimensional object, relatively uniform and significant in the 3rd dimension, but thin enough that its shape in the the other two dimensions is a significant feature; 'city block' is conceptually a tile; polygon (= taplytai or kardytai - shaped like an approximately-2-dimensional block, lijyclupa - a loop composed of lines). (cf. bliku, kubli, matci; karda, for which the 3rd dimension is insignificant, bliku, kurfa, matci, plita, tarmi)

tarbi.definition: x1 is an embryo/zygote/fetus/fertilized egg with mother x2, and father x3.

tarci.definition: x1 is a star/sun with stellar properties x2.

tarla.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of tar/asphalt from source x2.

tarmi.definition: x1 [ideal] is the conceptual shape/form of object/abstraction/manifestation x2 (object/abstract).
tarmi.notes: Also pattern; x1 is the mathematical or theoretical ideal form, while x2 is an object/event manifesting that form; e.g. circular/circle-shaped (= {cukseltai}) vs. circle (={cuktai}, while {cukla} alone is ambiguous); model (= {ci'ersaptai}, {saptai}, {ci'ersmitai}, {smitai}). See alse {nejni}, te {marji} for physical shape, {tapla}, {bliku}, {kubli}, {kurfa}, {cukla}, {mapti}, {morna}, {sarlu}.

tarti.definition: x1 behaves/conducts oneself as/in-manner x2 (event/property) under conditions x3.
tarti.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is behavioral. See also {cnano}, {frati}, {tcaci}, {cilce}, {jikca}, {marde}.

taske.definition: x1 thirsts for x2; x1 needs/wants drink/fluid/lubrication x2.

tatpi.definition: x1 is tired/fatigued by effort/situation x2 (event); x1 needs/wants rest.

tatru.definition: x1 is a/the breast/mammary/teat [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: projection providing liquid].

tavla.definition: x1 talks/speaks to x2 about subject x3 in language x4.
tavla.notes: Not limited to vocal speech, but this is implied by the x4 without context of some other medium of conversation (use cusku, casnu, skicu, ciksi for weaker implication of vocal communication); converse/discuss/chat (= {simta'a}, {simsku}, vricysimta'a for a conversation not clearly delimited by subject). See also {bacru}, cusku for actual expression, {casnu}, {darlu}, {skicu}, {ciksi}, {bangu}.

taxfu.definition: x1 is dress/a garment/clothing for wearing by x2 (gender/species/body part) serving purpose x3.
taxfu.notes: Also: x2 can wear/is wearing x1; refers to something intended for use as a garment, not merely something that happens to be worn at some time (which need not be true for dasni). See also {creka}, {cutci}, {daski}, {dasni}, {gluta}, {kosta}, {mapku}, {palku}, {pastu}, {skaci}, {smoka}, {lunbe}.

tcaci.definition: x1 is a custom/habit/[ritual/rut] of x2 under conditions x3.
tcaci.notes: Also: x1 is customary/usual/the practice. See also {fadni}, {kampu}, {lakne}, {jinzi}, {ckaji}, {cnano}, {tarti}, {ritli}, {javni}, {zekri}.

tcadu.definition: x1 is a town/city of metropolitan area x2, in political unit x3, serving hinterland/region x4.
tcadu.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is urban. See also {jarbu}, {nurma}, {cecmu}.

tcana.definition: x1 is a station/node of/in/on transport/communication/distribution system/network x2.
tcana.notes: x2 may be represented by massed vehicles of system. See also {dargu}, {litru}, {pluta}, {trene}, {ciste}, ve {mrilu}, {tivni}, {cradi}, ve {benji}, {fonxa}, {dikca}, {fatri}.

tcati.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of tea brewed from leaves x2.

tcena.definition: x1 stretches/extends to range x2 [interval/extent] in dimension x3 from relaxed range x4.

tcica.notes: Agentive deception (= {ticygau}, {ticyzu'e}); x3 could be an action or a belief on the part of x2; harmful intent or result is not implied (= {malticyzu'e} for such harmful intent); self deception (= {sezytcica}); deceive/trick into misguided action (= {ticyxlu}); misguided belief (= {tickri}); fib/lie/tell an untruth/lie/fib (= {ticysku}, {jifsku}), white lie (= {zanticysku}). See also {stace}, {xlura}, {stidi}, {kajde}.

tcidu.definition: x1 [agent] reads x2 [text] from surface/document/reading material x3; x1 is a reader.

tcika.definition: x1 [hours, minutes, seconds] is the time/hour of state/event x2 on day x3 at location x4.
tcika.notes: Also o'clock, time-of-day. (time units in x1 are specified as numbers separated by pi'e or are unit values massified with joi); See also cmavo list {ti'u}, {cacra}, {cerni}, {detri}, {donri}, {djedi}, {junla}, {nicte}, {mentu}, {snidu}, {temci}, {vanci}, {dirba}, {mokca}.

tcila.definition: x1 is a detail/feature/particular of x2.

tcima.definition: x1 is weather at place/region x2; (adjective:) x1 is meteorological.

tcini.definition: x1 [state/property] is a situation/condition/state/position/are conditions/circumstances of x2.
tcini.notes: Characteristics or environment of an object/event/process stage or state that are typically/potentially only temporary. See also {stuzi}, {zvati}, {vanbi}, ve {pruce}, {ckaji}, {zasni}.

tcita.definition: x1 is a label/tag of x2 showing information x3.

temci.definition: x1 is the time-duration/interval/period/[elapsed time] from time/event x2 to time/event x3.

tenfa.definition: x1 is the exponential result of base x2 to power/exponent x3.

tengu.definition: x1 (property-ka) is a texture of x2.

terdi.definition: x1 is the Earth/the home planet of race x2; (adjective:) x1 is terrestrial/earthbound.
terdi.notes: (cf. lunra, plini, solri, kensa, tsani; dertu for ground, dirt, except when used to express physical relative frame of reference E.g. on the ground, the ground beneath us. tsani)

terpa.definition: x1 fears x2; x1 is afraid/scared/frightened by/fearful of x2 (event/tu'a object).
terpa.notes: Also: x1 feels terror about x2; x2 is fearsome/fearful/frightening/scary to x1 (= selte'a to reorder places). See also {snura}, {xalni}, {xanka}, {virnu}.

terto.definition: x1 is a trillion [$10^{12}$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

tigni.definition: x1 performs x2 [performance] for/before audience x3.

tikpa.definition: x1 kicks [hits with x1's foot/feet x4] x2 in/at locus x3, using x1's foot/feet x4.

tilju.definition: x1 is heavy/weighty in mass/weight by standard x2.
tilju.notes: (cf. linto; carmi, se junri for metaphor, bunda, junta)

tinbe.definition: x1 obeys/follows the command/rule x2 made by x3; (adjective:) x1 is obedient.

tinci.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of tin (Sn); [metaphor: cheap or base metal].

tinsa.definition: x1 is stiff/rigid/inflexible/resistant in direction x2 against force x3 under conditions x4.
tinsa.notes: Also sometimes: firm, hard; not limited to physical forces; e.g. mental rigidity. See also {bapli}, {jdari}, {nandu}, {torni}, {trati}, {xarnu}, {danre}, {stodi}.

tirna.definition: x1 hears x2 against background/noise x3; x2 is audible; (adjective:) x1 is aural.

tirse.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of iron (Fe); [metaphor: strong, durable, tarnishing].
tirse.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is ferric/ferrous. See also {jinme}, {gasta}, {molki}.

tirxu.definition: x1 is a tiger/leopard/jaguar/[tigress] of species/breed x2 with coat markings x3.
tirxu.notes: A great cat noted/recognized by its markings, metaphorically: stripes, tiger markings. See also {mlatu}.

tisna.definition: x1 (object) fills/becomes stuffed [up]/inflates/blows up with material x2; x2 pours into x1.
tisna.notes: Implies some relative degree of fullness will result; agentive filling (= {tisyse'a}, {tisygau}, {tisyzu'e}); inflate/become inflated/blow up (= {gacytisna}, agentive {gacyse'a}); pour into (= {liktisna}, agentive {likse'a}). See also {culno}, {kunti}, {rinci}, {setca}.

titla.definition: x1 is sweet/sugary/saccharine to observer x2.

tivni.definition: x1 broadcasts/televises programming x2 via medium/channel x3 to television receiver x4.
tivni.notes: Also x1 is a broadcaster; x2 programming (mass), program/show (ind.). See also {cradi}, {skina}, {vidni}, {benji}, {tcana}.

tixnu.definition: x1 is a daughter of mother/father/parents x2; [not necessarily biological].

toknu.definition: x1 is an oven [enclosure that heats its contents] for baking/heating/drying x2.

toldi.definition: x1 is a butterfly/moth of species/breed x2.

tonga.definition: x1 is a tone/note of frequency/pitch x2 from source x3.

tordu.definition: x1 is short in dimension/direction x2 (default longest dimension) by measurement standard x3.

traji.definition: x1 is superlative in property x2 (ka), the x3 extreme (ka; default ka zmadu) among set/range x4.
traji.notes: Also: x1 is x3-est/utmost in x2 among x4; x1 is the x3 end of x4; x1 is extreme; x1 is simply x3. (cf. cmavo list rai, jimte, milxe, mutce, note contrast with milxe and mutce rather than with mleca and zmadu, which are values for x3, banli, curve, fanmo, krasi, manfo, prane)

trano.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of nitrogen/ammonia/nitrates.

trati.definition: x1 is taut/tense/strained tight in direction x2.

trene.definition: x1 is a train [vehicle] of cars/units x2 (mass) for rails/system/railroad x3, propelled by x4.
trene.notes: A railed vehicle or train of vehicles; also subway (tu'unre'e), metro, trolley, tramway (= {lajre'e}), roller coaster; monorail (= {dadre'e}); cable car, sky car, ski lift (= {cildadre'e}). See also {tcana}.

tricu.definition: x1 is a tree of species/cultivar x2.

trina.definition: x1 attracts/appeals to/lures x2 (person/event) with property/quality x3 (ka).
trina.notes: Also: x1 is alluring to x2. See also {djica}, {nelci}, {rigni}, {xlura}, {maksi}.

trixe.definition: x1 is posterior/behind/back/in the rear of x2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x3.
trixe.notes: Also: x3 is the standard of orientation for x2; spine (= {rixybo'u}, {rixybo'ukamju}). See also {crane}, {rebla}, {mlana}, {pritu}, {zunle}.

troci.definition: x1 tries/attempts/makes an effort to do/attain x2 (event/state/property) by actions/method x3.

tsali.definition: x1 is strong/powerful/[tough] in property/quality x2 (ka) by standard x3.

tsani.definition: x1 is an expanse of sky/the heavens at place x2; [celestial].

tsapi.definition: x1 is a seasoning/condiment/spice causing flavor/effect x2 (event/property).
tsapi.notes: Also: x1 flavors x2 (tu'a). See also {vrusi}.

tsiju.definition: x1(s) is/are (a) seed(s)/spore(s) [body-part] of organism x2 for producing offspring x3.
tsiju.notes: Also germ cell; implies actual potential for self-development; seeds generally contain embryo and food, and hence would include a fertilized egg. See also {tarbi}, {dembi}, {grute}, {jbari}, {sombo}, {spati}, {sovda}.

tsina.definition: x1 is a stage/platform/dais/[scaffold] at/in x2 supporting x3, made of material x4.

tubnu.definition: x1 is a length of tubing/pipe/hollow cylinder [shape/form] of material x2, hollow of material x3.
tubnu.notes: Also tube, sleeve, leg, hose, (adjective:) tubular. See also {kevna}, {canlu}.

tugni.definition: x1 [person] agrees with person(s)/position/side x2 that x3 (du'u) is true about matter x4.

tujli.definition: x1 is a tulip (defined by flower shape) of species/strain x2.

tumla.definition: x1 is a parcel/expanse of land at location x2; x1 is terrain.
tumla.notes: (cf. vacri, xamsi; tutra, which need not be land, gugde, xamsi)

tunba.definition: x1 is a sibling of x2 by bond/tie/standard/parent(s) x3.

tunka.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of copper (Cu); [metaphor: reddish, electrical conductor].

tunlo.notes: x1 swallows down food/drink. x2 (= {tulpinxe}, {tulcti}, {ctitu'o} (the latter two are more general - for food or beverage); swallow/engulf (= {galxycti}, {galxynerbi'o}, {galxygre}. See also {citka}, {pinxe}, {galxe}.

tuple.definition: x1 is a/the leg [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: supporting branch].

turni.definition: x1 governs/rules/is ruler/governor/sovereign/reigns over people/territory/domain/subjects x2.
turni.notes: x2 need not be complete specification of set of governed; reign/rule (= {noltru}); king/queen/sovereign (= {nolraitru}); pure democracy (= {roltrusi'o}), representative democracy (= {rolka'itrusi'o}), viceroy (= {ka'itru}), pure communism (= {kaurpo'esi'o}), board of directors/trustees, steering committee (= {trukamni}); government (= trugunma, trugri (emphasizing the components), truci'e (emphasizing the organization)). See also {catni}, {minde}, {tutra}, {jecta}, {gugde}, {ponse}, {jitro}.

tutci.definition: x1 is a tool/utensil/resource/instrument/implement used for doing x2; [form determines function].
tutci.notes: (cf. cabra, minji, se pilno, zukte, sazri, basic tool types: salpo, pulni, cfine, klupe, jendu, xislu, vraga; utensils: forca, smuci, dakfu; specifics: balre, mruli, cinza, garna, pijne, pambe, canpa, pilno, vraga)

tutra.definition: x1 is territory/domain/space of/belonging to/controlled by x2.

vacri.definition: x1 is a quantity of air/normally-gaseous atmosphere of planet x2, of composition including x3.

vajni.definition: x1 (object/event) is important/significant to x2 (person/event) in aspect/for reason x3 (nu/ka).
vajni.notes: Also: x1 matters to x2 in aspect/respect x3. See also {banli}, {ralju}, {vamji}, {dirba}, {kargu}, {pajni}.

valsi.definition: x1 is a word meaning/causing x2 in language x3; (adjective: x1 is lexical/verbal).

vamji.definition: x1 (ni) is the equivalent value/worth of x2 [item(s) of value] to x3 for use/appreciation x4.
vamji.notes: Also: x2 is worth x1 to x3; (for x2 person:) x2 merits (one sense), (adjective:) x2 is worthy (= selva'i for reordered places); merit reward (= {nemselva'i}); receive merited reward (= {vamselne'u}); x2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= {posyva'i}, {posyselva'i} for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {jdima}, {jerna}, {vecnu}, {dirba}, {janta}, {kargu}, {pleji}; see note at jdima on cost/price/value distinction, {vajni})

vamtu.definition: x1 vomits/regurgitates x2; x1 throws x2 up; [violent] digestive expulsion.

vanbi.definition: x1 (ind./mass) is part of an environment/surroundings/context/ambience of x2.
vanbi.notes: (adjective:) x1 is ambient. See also cmavo list {va'o}, {sruri}, {jibni}, {jbini}, {ferti}, {tcini}.

vanci.definition: x1 is an evening [from end-of-work until sleep typical for locale] of day x2 at location x3.
vanci.notes: This evening (= {cabvanci}); tomorrow evening (= {bavlamvanci}); yesterday evening (= {prulamvanci}). See also {cerni}, {murse}, {tcika}.

vanju.definition: x1 is made of/contains/is a quantity of wine from fruit/grapes x2.

vasru.definition: x1 contains/holds/encloses/includes contents x2 within; x1 is a vessel containing x2.
vasru.notes: [also accommodates, container; containment need not be total; x2 is Contained. in x1 (= selvau for reordered places)]; See also {bartu}, {jbini}, {nenri}, {zvati}, {cpana}, {botpi}, {lanka}.

vasxu.notes: (though used to make the Lojban word, clue word vascular is erroneous, actually pertaining to the circulatory system that carries the respired oxygen to the tissues); See also {fepri}, {kijno}, {vacri}.

vecnu.definition: x1 [seller] sells/vends x2 [goods/service/commodity] to buyer x3 for amount/cost/expense x4.
vecnu.notes: x1 is a salesperson/salesman/vendor; x3 buys x2 from x1 (= terve'u for reordered terms); x4 is the price of x2 to x3 (= velve'u for reordered terms); for sale (= {fitselve'u}, {selvenfriti}); x2 may be a specific object, a commodity (mass), an event, or a property; pedantically, for objects/commodities, this is sumti-raising from ownership of the object/commodity (= posyve'u, posyselve'u for unambiguous semantics). (cf. {canja}, {dunda}, {janta}, {pleji}, {jerna}, {kargu}, {prali}, {zarci}, {vamji}, {jdima}; see note at {jdima} on cost/price/value distinction, {fepni}, {friti}, {jerna}, {rupnu})

venfu.definition: x1 takes revenge on/retaliates against x2 (person) for wrong x3 (nu) with vengeance x4 (nu).
venfu.notes: Also avenge; (adjective:) x1 is vengeful. See also {sfasa}, {cnemu}.

vensa.definition: x1 is spring/springtime [warming season] of year x2 at location x3; (adjective:) x1 is vernal.

verba.definition: x1 is a child/kid/juvenile [a young person] of age x2, immature by standard x3.
verba.notes: Not necessarily human. See also {cifnu}, {makcu}, {citno}, {panzi}, {nanla}, {nixli}, se {rirni}, {bersa}.

vibna.definition: x1 is a/the vagina [body-part] of x2.

vidni.definition: x1 is a video monitor/CRT/screen [machine] serving function x2.

vidru.definition: x1 is a virus of species/breed/defining property x2 capable of infecting [at] x3.

vikmi.definition: x1 [body] excretes waste x2 from source x3 via means/route x4.

viknu.definition: x1 is thick/viscous under conditions x2.

vimcu.definition: x1 removes/subtracts/deducts/takes away x2 from x3 with/leaving result/remnant/remainder x4.
vimcu.notes: Also appropriates, confiscates; alienation is inherent. See also {lebna}, {muvdu}, {cpacu}, {canci}, {cliva}, {jdika}.

vindu.definition: x1 is poisonous/venomous/toxic/a toxin to x2.

vinji.definition: x1 is an airplane/aircraft [flying vehicle] for carrying passengers/cargo x2, propelled by x3.

vipsi.definition: x1 is a deputy/vice/subordinate in aspect [or organization principle] x2 (ka) to principal x3.

virnu.definition: x1 is brave/valiant/courageous in activity x2 (event) by standard x3.

viska.definition: x1 sees/views/perceives visually x2 under conditions x3.
viska.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is visual; x3 can include ambient lighting, background, etc. which may affect what is perceived; note that English "see" often means "look" or a more generic "observe", or even "understand, know". See also {catlu}, {jvinu}, {kanla}, {minra}, {simlu}, {djuno}, {jimpe}, {zgana}, {ganse}.

vitci.definition: x1 is irregular/occasional/intermittent in property/action/aspect x2.

vitke.definition: x1 is a guest/visitor of x2 at place/event x3; x1 visits x2/x3.

vitno.definition: x1 is permanent/lasting/[eternal] in property x2 (ka) by standard x3 [time-span/expectant one].

vlagi.definition: x1 is a/the vulva [body-part] of x2.

vlile.definition: x1 is an event/state/act of violence.

vlina.definition: x1 is a logical alternation/disjunction, stating that x2 (du'u) and/or x3 (du'u) is/are true.

vlipa.definition: x1 has the power to bring about x2 under conditions x3; x1 is powerful in aspect x2 under x3.
vlipa.notes: Also potent, has control/mastery. See also {tsali}, {jitro}, {ruble}.

vofli.definition: x1 flies [in air/atmosphere] using lifting/propulsion means x2.

voksa.definition: x1 is a voice/speech sound of individual x2.

vorme.definition: x1 is a doorway/gateway/access way between x2 and x3 of structure x4.
vorme.notes: Note: emphasis on route nature; solid door (= vrogai/vrobi'u/vrozu'itci). See also {canko}, {ganlo}, {kalri}, {murta}, {pagre}, {bitmu}, {kuspe}.

vraga.definition: x1 is a lever [tool] [of apparatus] for doing x2 [function/action], with fulcrum x3 and arm x4.

vreji.definition: x1 is a record of x2 (data/facts/du'u) about x3 (object/event) preserved in medium x4.

vreta.definition: x1 lies/rests/reclines/reposes on x2; x1 is reclining/recumbent/lying on x2.

vrici.definition: x1 (set/mass/ind.) is miscellaneous/various/assorted in property x2 (ka).

vrude.definition: x1 is virtuous/saintly/[fine/moral/nice/holy/morally good] by standard x2.
vrude.notes: Holy/saintly (= {cesyvu'e}). Virtue the attribute is "ka vrude". See also {palci}, {xamgu}, {marde}, {zabna}.

vrusi.definition: x1 (ka) is a taste/flavor of/emitted by x2; x2 tastes of/like x1.
vrusi.notes: Also: x2 tastes of seasoning x1, x1 is a seasoned flavor of x2 (= {tsapyvu'i}); vrusi may overlap the senses of taste and smell, since the latter is a significant component of taste. See also {kukte}, {tsapi}, {cpina}.

vukro.definition: x1 reflects Ukrainian language/culture/nationality in aspect x2.

xabju.definition: x1 dwells/lives/resides/abides at/inhabits/is a resident of location/habitat/nest/home/abode x2.

xadba.definition: x1 is exactly/approximately half/semi-/demi-/hemi- of x2 by standard x3.

xadni.definition: x1 is a/the body/corpus/corpse of x2; (adjective:) x1 is corporal/corporeal.

xagji.definition: x1 hungers for x2; x1 needs/wants food/fuel x2.

xagri.definition: x1 is a oboe/clarinet/saxophone [reed musical instrument] with reed x2.

xajmi.definition: x1 is funny/comical to x2 in property/aspect x3 (nu/ka); x3 is what is funny about x1 to x2.
xajmi.notes: Also: x1 is a comedian (= {xampre}, {xamseljibri} for a professional comedian). (x1 can be a person/object or an abstraction; be careful about possible sumti-raising); See also {bebna}, {cisma}, {cmila}, {fenki}, {zdile}.

xalbo.definition: x1 uses levity/is non-serious/frivolous about x2 (abstraction).

xalka.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of alcohol of type x2 from source/process x3.

xalni.definition: x1 (person) is panicked by crisis x2 (event/state).

xamgu.definition: x1 (object/event) is good/beneficial/nice/[acceptable] for x2 by standard x3.

xampo.definition: x1 is x2 ampere(s) [metric unit] in current (default is 1) by standard x3.

xamsi.definition: x1 is a sea/ocean/gulf/[atmosphere] of planet x2, of fluid x3; (adjective:) x1 is marine.

xance.definition: x1 is a/the hand [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: manipulating tool, waldo].

xanka.definition: x1 is nervous/anxious about x2 (abstraction) under conditions x3.

xanri.definition: x1 [concept] exists in the imagination of/is imagined by/is imaginary to x2.
xanri.notes: Also (adjective:) x1 is mental (one sense), x1 is unreal (one sense); in spite of the synonym, note that x1 is imaginary does not imply that it doesn't exist in the real world; the definition is crafted so that one can talk about imaginary things without claiming that they thereby don't exist. See also {fatci}, {senva}, {sucta}, {zasti}, {cfika}, {dacti}, {menli}, {sidbo}.

xanto.definition: x1 is an elephant of species/breed x2.

xarci.definition: x1 is a weapon/arms for use against x2 by x3.

xarju.definition: x1 is a pig/hog/swine/[boar] [pork/ham/bacon-producer] of species/breed x2.
xarju.notes: Sow (= {fetxarju}), boar (= {nakyxarju}), pork (= {xajre'u}), piglet (= {citxarju}). See also {mabru}, {cange}.

xarnu.definition: x1 is stubborn/willfully opposing/resisting x2 about x3 (event/state).
xarnu.notes: x2 may be a person, a state or condition, or a force; the essence is willful resistance. See also {tinsa}, {pante}, {bapli}, {fapro}.

xasli.definition: x1 is a donkey/jackass of species/breed x2.

xasne.definition: x1 is a/the sweat/perspiration from body x2, excreted by gland(s)/organs x3.

xatra.definition: x1 is a letter/missive/[note] to intended audience x2 from author/originator x3 with content x4.
xatra.notes: (cf. notci, which has places in a different order; the emphasis in xatra is on the communication between author and recipient, and not the content, which in a letter may not easily be categorized to a 'subject'; ciska, mrilu, papri)

xatsi.definition: x1 is $10^{-18}$ of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

xazdo.definition: x1 reflects Asiatic culture/nationality/geography in aspect x2.

xebni.definition: x1 hates/despises x2 (object/abstraction); x1 is full of hate for x2; x2 is odious to x1.
xebni.notes: x1 is hateful (one sense); x2 is hateful (different sense). See also {djica}, {nitcu}, {rigni}, {prami}, {nelci}.

xebro.definition: x1 reflects Hebrew/Jewish/Israeli culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

xecto.definition: x1 is a hundred [100; $10^2$] of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

xedja.definition: x1 is a/the jaw [body-part] of x2.

xelso.definition: x1 reflects Greek/Hellenic culture/nationality/language in aspect x2.

xendo.definition: x1 (person) is kind to x2 in actions/behavior x3.

xenru.definition: x1 regrets/rues (abstraction) x2; x1 is regretful/rueful/sorry/[remorseful] about x2.
xenru.notes: Also: x1 feels remorse about x2 (= {zugyxe'u}). (cf. cmavo list .u'u, zungi)

xexso.definition: x1 is $10^{18}$ of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

xindo.definition: x1 reflects Hindi language/culture/religion in aspect x2.
xindo.notes: Defaults to not include Urdu; Indian (Bharat) nationality may be implied (when constrained by xingu'e). See also {srito}, {xurdo}, {bengo}.

xinmo.definition: x1 is a quantity of ink of color/pigment x2 used by writing device x3.

xirma.definition: x1 is a horse/equine/[colt/mare/stallion/pony] of species/breed x2.

xislu.definition: x1 is a wheel [tool] of device/vehicle x2, made of materials/having properties x3.

xispo.definition: x1 reflects Hispano-American culture/nationalities in aspect x2.
xispo.notes: Refers to Spanish-speaking Latin-American countries, not Brazil/Guyana. See also {merko}, {mexno}, {spano}, {ketco}, {bemro}, {gento}.

xlali.definition: x1 is bad for x2 by standard x3; x1 is poor/unacceptable to x2.
xlali.notes: Be careful to distinguish between a bad/unacceptable event, and a bad/unacceptable agent: x1 does poorly (= lenu ko'a gasnu cu xlali and not normally ko'a {xlali}). See also {palci}, {mabla}, {xamgu}, {betri}.

xlura.definition: x1 (agent) influences/lures/tempts x2 into action/state x3 by influence/threat/lure x4.
xlura.notes: Also impresses; x4 is alluring (= {trivelxlu} for place reordering); x3 may be an achieved action/state, or an attempt to perform an action/enter a state). (x3 and x4 are normally events or states); See also {djica}, {mukti}, {trina}, {jitro}, {sazri}, {tcica}, {xance}, {stidi}, {kajde}, {maksi}.

xotli.definition: x1 is a hotel/inn/hostel at location x2 operated by x3.

xrabo.definition: x1 reflects Arabic-speaking culture/nationality in aspect x2.

xrani.definition: x1 (event) injures/harms/damages victim x2 in property x3 (ka) resulting in injury x4 (state).

xriso.definition: x1 pertains to the Christian religion/culture/nationality in aspect x2.

xruba.definition: x1 is a quantity of buckwheat/rhubarb/sorrel grass of species/strain x2.

xruki.definition: x1 is a turkey [food/bird] of species/breed x2.

xrula.definition: x1 is a/the flower/blossom/bloom [body-part] of plant/species x2; (adjective:) x1 is floral.

xruti.definition: x1 (agent) returns x2 to origin/earlier state x3 from x4; x1 moves/gives x2 back to x3 from x4.
xruti.notes: x2 goes back/reverts/Retreats. to x3 (= {se'ixru} for agent self-returning to a previous location/situation: renumber places in the lujvo); (x3 may be a location or a person or an event/situation; the latter may also be expressed with {krefu} or {rapli} and a causative like {rinka}/{rikygau}). See also {benji}, {krefu}, {rapli}, {rinka}.

xukmi.definition: x1 is an instance of substance/chemical/drug x2 (individual or mass) with purity x3.

xurdo.definition: x1 reflects Urdu language/culture/nationality in aspect x2.

xusra.definition: x1 (agent) asserts/claims/declares x2 (du'u) is true [can be used for epistemology of authority].
xusra.notes: Also: x1 states/says that/affirms/purports to know that x2. (cf. natfe which is propositional and non-agentive, nupre)

zabna.definition: x1 is a favorable connotation/sense/way-of-looking-at x2 used by x3.

zajba.definition: x1 is a gymnast at/performs gymnastics feat x2.

zalvi.definition: x1 [individual or mass of hard surfaces] grinds/pulverizes/crushes x2 into powder x3.
zalvi.notes: May need mosra tanru. See also {daspo}, {purmo}, {marxa}, {pulce}, {canre}, {molki}.

zanru.definition: x1 approves of/gives favor to plan/action x2 (object/event).

zarci.definition: x1 is a market/store/exchange/shop(s) selling/trading (for) x2, operated by/with participants x3.
zarci.notes: Also: mall, marketplace, shopping center, cooperative, bazaar, trading post, mart; the concept is the function of selling/exchanging coupled with a location, and is more oriented to the larger concept of marketplace than the stalls/shops that comprise it, though it does not exclude the latter individual shops (= {zaisle}); x3 may include both owners/proprietors and customers in some markets, but in most contexts refers only to the operators. See also {vecnu}, {canja}, {dinju}, {banxa}.

zargu.definition: x1 is a/the buttock(s)/arse/rear/seat [body-part] of x2; [metaphor: rounded surface, support].
zargu.notes: Also ass, behind, butt. See also {ganxo}, {mabla}.

zasni.definition: x1 is temporary/not permanent/expected to change in property x2 (ka) by standard/expectant x3.

zasti.definition: x1 exists/is real/actual/reality for x2 under metaphysics x3.
zasti.notes: Words usable for epistemology typically have a du'u place. x1 is physical (one sense). See also {fatci}, {xanri}.

zbabu.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of soap from source x2 of composition including x3.

zbani.definition: x1 is a bay in/of coast/shoreline x2.

zbasu.definition: x1 makes/assembles/builds/manufactures/creates x2 out of materials/parts/components x3.
zbasu.notes: Should not be used to express causation. Cf. {cupra}, {larcu}, {rutni}, {finti}, {gundi}.

zbepi.definition: x1 is a pedestal/base/stand/pallet supporting x2 (object/event), of materials/properties x3.

zdani.definition: x1 is a nest/house/lair/den/[home] of/for x2.
zdani.notes: Home (= {tercnizda}), house (constructed building) (= {zdadi'u}). See also {dinju}, {ginka}, {kumfa}, se {xabju}.

zdile.definition: x1 (abstract) is amusing/entertaining to x2 in property/aspect x3; x3 is what amuses x2 about x1.
zdile.notes: Also: x1 occupies x2 pleasantly; x1 is fun for x2; x2 is amused by x1; x2 has fun (at) doing x1; x1 is an amusement/entertainment/game for x2. See also {cinri}, {panka}, {xajmi} for funny, {kelci}.

zekri.definition: x1 (event/state) is a punishable crime/[taboo/sin] to people/culture/judges/jury x2.

zenba.definition: x1 (experiencer) increases/is incremented/augmented in property/quantity x2 by amount x3.

zepti.definition: x1 is $10^{-21}$ of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).
zepti.notes: (cf. grake, mitre, snidu, stero, delno, molro, kelvo, xampo, gradu. litce, merli, centi, decti, dekto, femti, gigdo, gocti, gotro, kilto, megdo, mikri, milti, nanvi, petso, picti, terto, xatsi, xecto, xexso, zetro)

zetro.definition: x1 is $10^{21}$ of x2 in dimension/aspect x3 (default is units).

zgana.definition: x1 observes/[notices]/watches/beholds x2 using senses/means x3 under conditions x4.
zgana.notes: Behold/watch/gaze (= {vi'azga}); guard/watchman/sentinel (= {zgaku'i}, {jdeku'i}). See also cmavo list {ga'a}, {ganse}, {viska}, {catlu}, {tirna}, {pencu}, {sumne}, {kurji}, {canci}, {catlu}, {jarco}, {lanli}, {pinka}, {simlu}.

zgike.definition: x1 is music performed/produced by x2 (event).
zgike.notes: x2 event may be person playing instrument, singing, musical source operating/vibrating, etc.; instrument (= {zgica'a}); play an instrument (= {zgica'apli}, {zgiterca'a}, {selzgigau}, {selzgizu'e}); song (= {sagzgi}, {selsa'a}); voice, as used musically (= {zgivo'a}); composed music (= {finzgi}). See also {damri}, {dansu}, {flani}, {janbe}, {jgita}, {pipno}, {rilti}, {tabra}, {tonga}, {xagri}, {siclu}.

zifre.definition: x1 is free/at liberty to do/be x2 (event/state) under conditions x3.
zifre.notes: Also unrestricted, unfettered, unconstrained; (adjective:) independent; (adverb:) willingly, voluntarily, freely, may, optionally; (potential:) x1 voluntarily does x2. See also {pinfu}, {rinju}, {bilga}, {curmi}, {kakne}, {frili}.

zinki.definition: x1 is a quantity of/contains/is made of zinc (Zn); [metaphor: hard metal].

zivle.definition: x1 (agent) invests resources x2 in investment x3 expecting return/profit x4 (object(s)/event).
zivle.notes: [also ties up/Risks/gambles. x1 is an investor; x2 are invested assets of x1; bond (= {jertervle})]; See also {prali}, {canja}, {jbera}, {dejni}, {ponse}.

zmadu.definition: x1 exceeds/is more than x2 in property/quantity x3 (ka/ni) by amount/excess x4.
zmadu.notes: Also positive (= {nonmau}). See also cmavo list {mau}, {mleca}, {zenba}, {jmina}, {bancu}, {dukse}, {traji}.

zmiku.definition: x1 is automatic in function x2 under conditions x3.

zukte.definition: x1 is a volitional entity employing means/taking action x2 for purpose/goal x3/to end x3.
zukte.notes: Also acting at, undertaking, doing; agentive cause with volition/purpose; also x3 objective, end. See also cmavo list {zu'e}, {bapli}, {gunka}, {jalge}, {krinu}, {mukti}, {rinka}, {snuti}, {gasnu}, {fasnu}, {minji}, {prenu}, {ciksi}, {jibri}, {pilno}, {pluta}, {tadji}, {tutci}.

zumri.definition: x1 is a quantity of maize/corn [grain] of species/strain x2.

zunle.definition: x1 is to the left/left-hand side of x2 which faces/in-frame-of-reference x3.
zunle.notes: Also x3 is the standard of orientation for x2. See also cmavo list {zu'a}, {pritu}, {mlana}, {crane}, {trixe}, {farna}.

zunti.definition: x1 (evt./state) interferes with/hinders/disrupts x2 (evt./state/process) due to quality x3 (ka).
zunti.notes: Also blocks, obstructs, baffles; not necessarily forcing cessation. See also {fanta}, {dicra}, {fliba}, {fanza}, {raktu}, {klina}, {bandu}, {cfipu}, {ganlo}.

zutse.definition: x1 sits [assumes sitting position] on surface x2.

zvati.notes: Atemporal; location equivalent of {cabna}. Refers to a nonce location for an object/activity that is mobile. (cf. especially stuzi for an inherent/inalienable location, jbini, nenri, se vasru, cpana, diklo, jibni, cabna, lamji, tcini, xabju, jmive, jundi, vitke)
